1.content:
When you awoke, you felt like today was going to be like any other. You noticed a heavy pressure on your whole body. Your mother had apparently rolled over in her sleep, flattening you into her back. "When am I going to get my own bed again?", you groaned. Your mom got rid of your bed after a raccoon had gotten into your room and ate you. You came out just fine and healthy (though you were in much need of a bath), but your mother didn't want to take anymore chances, so you slept with her from then on. Any time she rolled on top of you, you either went back to sleep or attempted to wake her up. Regardless, until she got up on her own, you weren't going anywhere. Luckily, though, you didn't need to worry about this, as she woke up shortly after. Your mother groaned as she sat up and stretched, you were brought up with her, still flattened on her back.


"Morning hon... aw crud, did I smoosh you in my sleep again, honey?"
"Mmm-hmm" You couldn't give a proper answer, given your current situation.
Mom peeled you off and laid you out on her bed. "We really need to do something about this," she said. "That's the third time this week I've had to scrape you off. Maybe I should get a couple of body pillows..."
"Or...", you interrupted. "You could get me my own bed, that way I'd never get squished." Your body had regained it's three dimensions as your mother knelt down to you.
"Sweetie, you know why I can't do that..."

"But I'll be fine, Momma. The exterminator said he took care of the nest, and the only pests we've got are ants and they really don't like how I taste." Jack was an odd little guy. He was basically immortal, but he was also practically helpless on his own.
"Jack, honey, I just can't take that chance. I don't know what I'd do if I lost you." The boy was obviously disappointed, but he understood. "I'll tell you what. Since you've been really good this week, I'll take you somewhere special I know you'll love."
"Alright!" Trish knew how to cheer her son up.
"Okay, sweetie, as soon as we both get dressed, we can go to..."

12.content:
Any time your mother took you to the mall, that usually meant you were going to walk out with a new toy or video game. Because of your condition, playing sports was out of the question, so your mom had no problem with you spending your free time in your made up worlds. You already had all the video games you wanted right now, so you decided you wanted a new toy. All you had to do was convince your mother.

"Mom, can I get a toy?", you asked as you entered the mall.

"Let me get the body pillows, first, honey."

"But mom," you whined. "There's a lot of scalpers in the area. If I don't get it now, I'll probably never be able to complete my collection." Mom was starting to get frustrated. Even though you were normally a well-behaved child and never threw tantrums, you were persistent when you found something you wanted.

"Look, I know how hard it is to find your newer toys, but we have priorities, son. If we don't find what you're looking for, you can just save your money and try somewhere else."

You looked up at her with a puppy dog-eyed pout. "You squished me, mom. How could you do that? Do you have any idea what that could do to me, mentally? That could scar me for life. It could really mess me up. If I got something to get my mind off of it, I might be able to forget about it and become a properly functioning member of society." Despite being so small and helpless, you were a master at guilt-tripping.

Trish sighed and held her head, muttering under her breath. "Why does he have to be so damn smart." She took your hand and went back to the toy store. "Fine, you win." You snickered as you ran inside, knowing exactly where to look. Normally, being around a bunch of excited little kids worried you, but with their parents making sure they behave and being surrounded by toys, you were considerably more relaxed. You found your target: A giant vinyl Reshiram. Naturally, there was only one of them, so you wasted no time snagging it. As you exited the aisle, you noticed something.

121.content:
You were almost to the end of the aisle when you heard someone yell at you. "Hey, I saw that first!" In front of you stood little blonde girl, you guessed about 7 or 8 years old. She had pink leopard print pants, purple shoes, a white belt, and an expensive-looking Justin Beiber shirt. You'd be lying if you said you didn't find her to be pretty.
"Well I got it first. Besides, how do you even know what I picked up?" The girl quickly walked closer to you.
"It's a big Reshiram toy. I had my daddy set it aside for me this morning, but his stupid employees must've put it back on the shelf. You do know my family owns this toy store, right?" You slowly walked backward with the Pokemon toy.

"No, I didn't. Even so, that doesn't give you the right to take everything for yourself."
"Uh, yeah it does. Now give it!" The girl grabbed the white dragon toy in your hands, but you continued to hold on.
"No, that's not fair!" You attempted to pry it from her greedy hands.
"Let it go, it's practically mine already!" She was a lot stronger than you, though, so was pretty much everyone. Still, you had a pretty good grip. She picked and you up off of the floor and shook you around. "Ugh! Let go already, you little runt!"
"Not a ch- HEY!" You were caught off guard as the girl bit your arm. She looked confused for a moment and hesitantly spit it out, licking her lips afterward.

"Is this... cheesecake? You taste like cheesecake! And why is your arm so soft?", she asked.
You let go of the toy, sensing you were in danger. "Uh, you can... you can keep Reshiram. I don't really like him anyway." You tried to run, but the girl immediately caught you in her arms. "Let go of me!"
"Not 'til I see something, first!" She poked her finger into your chest and it went through with very little effort from her. The girl then took held your face by the sides.
"Please don't do this! Please sto-mmmmmmphhhhhh!" You were interrupted as she began stretching your face out. "Hahahahaha! This is too funny!" She then squished it together between her hands and stretched it out again, laughing as your face became distorted and flattened out. "Okay." The girl let go of your face and giggled as it snapped back to it's original shape. "I think that settles it." You rubbed your face as you sat there confused.

"Settles what?" You yelped as she grabbed you by your arm.
"You're going to be my new toy!", she said without skipping a beat. You panicked and tried to flee, but the store owner's daughter held you tight. "I wonder just how squishy you are, runt..." She grabbed your legs and arms and compressed them into your body, with your head following afterward.
"No, stop! Momm-mph!" You were cut off as she put you into a vice grip, squishing you into her chest until you were a disk roughly the size of her stomach.
"Now, where am I gonna put you?"

choices: You think you know what you're feeling.
1222.content:
You panicked as you felt someone grab you. You froze in terror until you saw who picked you up. It was Ash, Andrew's cousin who ate you last Halloween. You still weren't really sure of what to think of him. He had been bullying you up until the point where he wolfed you down, and he continued to taunt you even as you were being digested. Afterward, though, was when you got these weird feelings about him. He was extremely apologetic and made it a point to help you feel better, saying he only did it out of impulse and hunger. He's been acting sort of like your big brother ever since, though he does mess with you every now and then. He was also easily the coolest person you knew, even more now that he works at a toy store.

"Jack? What're you doing here, little guy?", he asked.
"Uh... one of the workers stepped on me and I got stuck. I didn't know you worked here."
"Yeah, I've been here a few months. I actually just got here" Ash sat you on top of the counter and used the phone. The two of you had been spending a lot of time together lately, since he found out your father walked out on you as a baby. You did fun stuff together, like go-kart racing, laser tag; activities where you had little chance of getting squished. Sometimes he did so by accident (he accidently sat in the kart you were in once), but you didn't get mad like you usually did.

"Alright, I called your mom and told her where you were. She said she's gonna pick you up after she does some shopping." Ash clocked in and put his lunch in the refrigerator. "I wish I could talk more, but I need to get to work. We'll catch up during my break, kay?" He tousled your "hair" and walked off, keeping you from seeing him wipe his hands off. Every part of your body was made of the same material, including what other people saw as your hair, making your whole being one single piece. This made your hair feel extremely weird to others. "Later, Jack."
"W-wait!", you exclaimed. "Um... is it... is it alright if I ... uh... if I spend the night at your house?"
"It's a saturday, so sure. You'll need to ask your mom if it's okay with her, though. Don't want a repeat of last time."
"No... I guess you're right." One afternoon, when you were supposed to be studying, you snuck off to hang out with Ash. Once your mother found out you were missing, she freaked out and called the police to search for you. It was pretty embarrassing when they found out you were just a couple of blocks away. You were grounded for an entire month for your little stunt.

As Ash left for his job, you tried to wrap your head around these questions you had. Why did you go through so much trouble to see him? How come you felt so uneasy when speaking to him? Why did you want to spend so much time with him? Being so young, you weren't really sure what was going on with your emotions. What were you going to do?
1222.title: These feels...

choices: He feels you and gets up.
12221.content:
As much as you didn't want to admit it, it was pretty obvious what you were feeling. What you were feeling was love. You couldn't think of anything else it could be. You started thinking about why you were feeling this way. For starters, he was the only other person who spent time with you that didn't talk your ears off and make dumb jokes. He also made it a point to help you live as close to a normal life as possible. Though, he was a bit careless at times, sometimes forgetting where you were and sitting on you. For some reason, you didn't get mad at him. If Andrew or your mom had done it, you wouldn't talk to them for the rest of the day. Did... did you enjoy getting squished, or even being eaten by him?

You started blushing while thinking of all the reasons why you could have grown fond of him. Maybe you were in love with him, after all. You knew that he was having problems with his girlfriend, too, and often talked about being this close to breaking up with her. From what you heard, she was extremely selfish, ungrateful, and totally rude. Maybe if you showed him what you were willing to do for him, you could give him that little push he needed to get rid of her. First, you had to play saboteur. You hopped off of the counter and walked over to the fridge where the employees kept their lunch and looked for Ash's. After finding it, you dumped his food out into the trash. Step one: complete. Now, you just had to wait for him to go on break. Since you knew your mom took forever when she was shopping, you knew you had plenty of time to wait.

====================================================

After waiting a few hours, you watched Ash walk into the break room. You now had your chance. He looked into the fridge and searched through the employees' lunch. "Where the hell is it? Dammit, Vikki, did you take my pizza again?!" He slammed the door and clutched his empty, growling belly. You felt sort of bad for putting him through this, but you were about to make it up to him. Just as he pulled a chair aside and turned back around, you sat in it. You looked up to see his blue-jean clad butt about to sit on you. Your body made a *squelch* sound upon being squished by ass. You couldn't really explain it, but you felt like you enjoyed him sitting on you. Part two of your plan was complete. All that needed to happen was for Ash to notice that he had sat on his little buddy...
12221.title: boy crush

122211.content:
Almost instantly Ash got up, apologizing for sitting on you. You reply that it's fine because it always happens and he lets it go. You were a little upset that he instantly noticed you but you reasoned to yourself that there was plenty of other opportunities left to you.


THE NEXT DAY

You had come back to Ash's house the next day, although this time you made sure not to announce your destination to anyone but your mom because she would worry if she didn't know where you were. Ash always took a shower at this time of the day. Ash's cousins always kept to themselves inside their room unless they knew you were there. Ash's Aunt also had work at the moment so this was just about the perfect time to infiltrate the house. You came into the house from the backdoor that you knew they never locked. As you walked in you saw...

A: A Naked Ash just sitting on the couch. It seemed as though his shower ended earlier then you thought.
B: Ash Exercising on an exercise bike. When he gets off for a break you could squeeze yourself onto the seat so he sits on you.
C: No one, time to trek onwards.

12321.content:
You were in a terrible situation, and you knew it. You had no idea where your mom was, and it looked like she wasn’t going to show up in time to save you. However, before the boy could do anything else with you, a voice called out to him.

“Excuse me young man.” An attractive voice called out. The boy whirled around, and found himself staring up at one of the store’s employees. She appeared to be about sixteen, and she was noticeably curvy. She had wavy brown hair, and brown eyes. Her nametag read, “Sam”.

“Y…yes?” The little boy muttered, shy in front of the girl. He was far from puberty, but he could recognize when a girl was attractive. He started to blush, and Sam noticed it.

“Aw.” She cooed, and she bent down to look him in the eye. She pated his head. “You aren’t in trouble champ. You just can’t buy that toy without money. That’s all.”

“Oh…” The kid pouted, and held you out to Sam. Before you could move, Sam snatched you up, tightly gripping you in her hand. Her finger pressed down on your mouth, squashing it flat. Unintentionally, she had effectively rendered you temporarily mute. You also were kept from moving at all by her tight grip.

“It’s okay kid. Maybe this toy will still be here later.” The kid nodded, and then ran off. Sam smiled, watching him go, and then she stood up. She loved kids.

Regardless, she had never seen this toy in the store before. She stared down at you, and you stared up at her, her liquidy brown eyes peering closely at you. You wished you could signal her attention, but it was useless. You were still mostly shaped as a ball, with only a squished leg and arm poking out. You looked nothing like a real person.

Curious, Sam pressed down harder on your leg, and it easily flattened. She giggled, watching your leg be crushed by her fingers. This toy certainly was entertaining, and she could see why the little boy had wanted it. However, she couldn’t just give toys away for free. She would lose her job for sure.

Taking her attention away from the toy, she was about to put it on the shelf, when she suddenly had a thought. Her eight year old cousin’s birthday was coming up, and she still hadn’t picked out a present. She looked at you thoughtfully, and realized how perfect you would be. Still, she didn’t want to upset the little boy by taking the toy he had wanted.

What does Sam decide to do?

1232322222.content:
You immediately ceased your struggles, not wanting to melt even more. You could feel a bit of your body be sucked into the pull-up. You concentrated your body and tried to reconstitute yourself. To others, a part of your body being separated from you would seem bad. At the most, though, it was just a mild inconvenience. All you had to do was touch the bit that had been separated and concentrate to make it rejoin you. If you weren't able to get the piece back, it would just make you a little bit smaller until you did. That was probably why you were so small. After years of getting squished, eaten, and absorbed into various objects, there were probably tiny pieces of your body all over the place. You also grew very slowly, so there's that, too.

Unfortunately, Timmy kept shuffling around in his seat, constantly squishing you underneath and between his butt cheeks. You can only reconstitute your body when it isn't being disturbed.

The little boy had abused your body so much, that you were now stuck like gum on his butt. And with him shuffling his rear, you were getting squashed even more. *KATHUNK!* Suddenly, you heard a loud noise and felt Timmy jump up. He then quickly landed back on top of you. Your captor giggled as he heard your body go *splat*.
"Dang potholes! I wish they'd fix this road sometime this year...", you heard his mother say.
"That was fun, mommy. Let's do it again!"
"Well, they haven't repaired the road yet, so we're bound to hit a few more on the way home."
You whimpered upon hearing this. "I want my mommy...", you whined.

======================================================================

After an very bumpy ride, your playful kidnapper had arrived home. You had been so squished by little Timmy's butt, that you almost felt like you were a part of it by now. "Alright, sweetie, we're home now." You heard the car door open and the seat belt being unbuckled. Timmy slid out of his car seat, squishing you into his butt even further, and hopped out of the car. You felt your body shift from side to side as he walked to his house. His mother opened the door and the two walked inside. She knelt down to her son.
"You can go play with your toys while mommy makes dinner", she said. "Since you've been such a good boy today, I'm making your favorite."
"Pasketti!", Timmy squealed with joy.
"It's spaghetti, you doofus!", you thought to yourself. By now, you didn't care if he was younger than you. He had kidnapped you and used you as a toy.

"Thank you, mommy!" Timmy gave his mother a big hug.
"You're welcome, honey", she said as she gave her son a kiss on the cheek.
You were reminded of your own mother. She must be worried sick; probably still in the mall, looking everywhere for you. Unfortunately, until Timmy took you out, you weren't going anywhere.

He quickly ran to his room to play with his toys... which now included you. As he opened the door, he felt a pressure in his gut. You whimpered as you heard a rumbling from above.
*Frrrraaaapppp*
Timmy laughed as he released a small, but nonetheless stinky fart right into you. "Hope it don't stink too much, new toy."
With your mouth being squished somewhere in your body, you couldn't respond. The boy walked into his room and shut the door. He didn't want his mother to see his new toy. You heard his pants drop and his pull-up crinkle as he ripped it off. Since you were facing the inside of his butt, you still couldn't see anything or smell the fresh air, still having to breath the remains of his fart. You immediately began to struggle to free yourself from your kidnapper's buttocks.

"Hey, he isn't in the pull-up." Timmy said, upset. You heard him whine, as if he were about to cry, when he suddenly felt your wiggling. "Oh. He must be stuck to my bottom." Your body shifted again as the boy walked up to a mirror in the corner. He turned around and looked at his rear.

13.content:
You squealed with excitement upon hearing this. The Splash Zone waterpark was just about your favorite place in the world. You wasted no time getting ready, rushing into your room and changing into your favorite wetsuit, a bright blue one with neon green and black accents. After suiting up, you run into mom's room.
"Wait, go get Andrew from next door. I promised to take him as a reward for mowing the lawn." You groaned and walked next door to his house. Having Andy around was a mixed blessing. Sure, he helped your mom out, protected you from animals, and kept you from being lonely; but he's pretty annoying. He always wants to borrow your stuff, he felt a need to spout these dumb jokes, and, honestly, you were jealous of him. Andrew was better than you at everything and you felt like he was stealing your mother from you (in actuality, she kept him around because his parents are too busy to spend much time with him).

Still, though, it was the middle of summer and it would likely be packed. It's best to have as many people watching out for you as possible, lest you get trampled.You rang the doorbell and Andy ran out. Your mother told him about the trip last night and he was just as excited as you. He suddenly tripped and fell belly-first right on top of you with an audible SPLAT. "Ugh... Thanks for breaking my fall, Ja-... uh oh." The boy slowly got to his feet and giggled upon seeing your flattened form plastered to his tummy like a sticker, just above his Spider-Man swim trunks. "Oops. Sorry Jack. I hope I don't belly flop again when we get to the high dive." You groaned as he laughed at his own stupid joke. He peeled you off his abdomen and blew into your mouth to inflate you. "Bleh," Andy expressed his disgust at touching lips. "You really need to be more careful, Jack."

"We both need to be more careful." You didn't want to upset him, but you needed to let him know that it was his fault.
"C'mon, let's go!" Andrew grabbed you by the arm and tossed you into your mom's car. He quickly put his seatbelt on and waited for your mom as you strapped yourself into your booster seat. Trish came in shortly afterward, wearing a white and red one-piece bathing suit. You quickly plugged your ear buds into your DS and started playing Pokemon. You were finishing up on what you read on the internet was a "Joey Run" after finding out how much of a beast Rattata and Raticate actually were.

"Hey, Jack. Shut it off, we're here!" Andrew turned it off for you and put it away. You and Andy quickly unbuckled your seat belt and jumped out of the car. Your mother wrapped a towel around her waist and got out her purse and beach bag. Just before you reached the entrance, you heard your mother mutter "Shit," while digging through her purse.

"Sorry, boys. Ignore what you heard. Only brought enough for two. Hey kids, come here real quick." She knelt down to your level. "Jack, honey. Mommy only brought enough money for two people, so I'm gonna need to ask of huge favor of you." You gulped, knowing what this meant. Any time your mom was short on cash while going to an amusement park, she'd compress you into a tiny ball and shove you in her mouth like a jawbreaker or bubblegum, go to the restroom, and spit you out; leaving you to enjoy the park for free until you left, where you'd have to repeat the process.
"G... go ahead." You closed your eyes as Trish's hands came down upon you, squishing you into the pavement. She then picked you up, rolled you into a ball and compressed you from all sides until you were a tiny sphere the size of a quarter.
"I'm sorry honey, I'll change you back as soon as we get to the restroom." She then popped you into her mouth and began chewing, not wanting to look suspicious.

"Miss Harper, doesn't that hurt him?" Andy was concerned for you, knowing that you hated it when he accidentally squished you.
"Jack can't get hurt, honey. I know he doesn't like it, though. But he's tough, so I know he can take it." The sounds of your mother talking made your body vibrate.
"What's he taste like?"
"Why do you ask?"
"I dunno, it seemed like you done it before."
"Well, it's kinda like... Jack doesn't really have a flavor, sweetie." She was lying, though. You actually tasted similar to strawberry cheesecake. She didn't want the boy to get any ideas.

You really hated being gum. The sensation of being chewed, getting drenched in saliva, the smell of mom's breath, not to mention the constant threat of being forgotten and accidentally swallowed (which, thankfully, has never happened). Your thoughts were interrupted when Trish got to the ticket booth.
"One adult and one child, please." After receiving the wristbands, she took Andrew into the restroom and made sure no one was around before spitting you into her hand.
Andrew giggled upon seeing your chewed-up body. "Heehee... He looks like a little blob with eyes." You weren't happy with Andy watching.
"Don't look at me like that, hon. You know why I had to do it."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------

It took you about ten minutes to fully reform and regain you original size. After which, you rushed out of the bathroom and headed straight for...

"JACK, WAIT!"

Your mom grabbed you and stopped you in your tracks. "Where do you think you're going?! Do you have any idea how dangerous it is for you out here?" You crossed your arms and pouted.
"Shouldn't you ease up a little bit? I think he's been chewed out enough for today." Why did he have to tag along?
"Uh... yeah... look. Jackie, honey, if you get lost in here I might never see you again. I don't want you going anywhere without either me or Andrew watching you."
"...fine. Let's go, Andy." The boy quickly grabbed you by the arm and dragged you away.
"Alright! First we can go on the playground, then... no, maybe the wave pool.... nah, the huuuuuuge waterslide, and... no, we should save that for last... maybe we should just sunbathe for a while first."
"Hey, Andy?"
"Yeah, Jack?"
"I don't feel so good right, now. I'm still a little worn out from earlier. I think I'm gonna go on the lazy river with mom. You can go ahead, though."

"Are you sure? Alright, then!" The annoying neighbor kid quickly ran off to have fun. You knew it would work. Now you could do whatever you wanted and not have to hear his lame jokes. First order of business was the...

Andrew stuttered, struggling to find the right words, saying “Uh..um…excuse me but I uh…have you by any chance seen a kid, around my age?” The woman smirked, pretended to look around at the crowded amusement park, and replied sarcastically, “You bet” Andrew mock laughed, and continued, “No ma’am, I mean when I walked up I thought…I uh…I thought I heard my friends voice coming from your tummy.” The woman chuckled and shook her head, saying “You kids crack me up, listen bud. What is inside my stomach is between me and my lunch. Capiche?” Andrew stood there, not wanting to let her leave his sight, and began nervously looking around for Trish. And to top it all off Yumyum, a good a name as any to give her tasty treat, was moving around so much in her belly it was making her queasy.

She was debating whether to make a run for it when she had a wonderful idea. She put on a sad face, then looked directly into Andrew's eyes and spoke to him. "I'm sorry for snapping at you kid, I'm just a little cranky when I first wake up. Is your little friend you mentioned lost or something?" Andrew looked at her anxiously, then glanced around hopefully for Trish before answering. "Well, he went missing about an hour ago. But like I said, I'm pretty sure I heard his voice coming from your tummy." The pudgy woman did her best to feign ignorance and tried to look confused. "From inside my tummy? Well I admit since I ate it's been a bit noisier than usual, but I can assure you it wasn't your little pal you heard in there." She said sweetly, even as Jack thrashed about within her depths.

Andrew for his part was still unconvinced. "But I heard...", he started before the woman interrupted him. "You must just be so worried about your pal that you're hearing things. I mean, how could he have gotten there in the first place? It's impossible for a person like me to just swallow a kid whole." Andrew was going to correct her on the fact his friend had been eaten plenty of times before, but she pressed on. "And besides, why on earth would I eat your friend even if I could? Do you think I'm some kind of ugly kid eating monster?" She said with a hurt tone, putting on a few crocodile tears for good measure. "No not at all!", Andrew said thinking he had hurt the poor woman's feelings. "In fact I think you look really beautiful!" Pretending to dry her tears the woman sniffled. "Aw, thats so sweet. A little gentleman. What's your name kid?" "Andrew.", he replied with a smile glad to have received a compliment from such a hotty. "Andrew huh, well I'm Donna. And don't worry, with a guy like you on the case I'm sure you'll find your pal. Who knows, he might even be closer by than you think." She said, with a secret smirk to herself.

Andrew grinned ear to ear, so happy with Donna's praise he once again pushed Jack towards the back of his mind and went back to just admiring how hot he thought she was. Heck, if she was giving this much attention for looking for Jack who knows, maybe when he found him Donna would give him a kiss for his heroics.

So with a quick apology for disturbing her nap, Andrew ran off to try and locate Jack. Not knowing he was getting further and further away.

Back in Donna's belly, Jack couldn't believe what had just happened. Andrew had HEARD his calls for help, but with a few kind words from Jack's captor/fleshy prison the perve had forgotten all about it and ran off. Jack was so shocked, he just slumped back in defeat and sobbed.

Donna meanwhile was pleased with herself. She had tricked that dumb brat into leaving her alone and Yumyum seemed to have finally calmed down. He must have finally gotten used to his new home she thought to herself as she stroked her belly. Still that had been too close for comfort. If she wanted to keep Yumyum all to herself then she would need to get out of here before a more competent search party came along. And so as Donna gets ready to leave.....

131212212.content:
(Max's POV)

"EVERYONE, GARY IS DOING REALLY GROSS STUFF TO ME!" you scream on top of your lungs, "AND NOW HE EVEN POOPED HIMSELF!"

To your horror, you can see that none of the other kids are looking at you. You assume that they don't want to be your situation. Just then, you can feel a hand on your shoulder. Shuddering, you remember that your tormentor is still sitting next to you. Once you're bold enough to look at him, you see that he's still smiling in a seemingly friendly way. He grabs you by your shoulders and pulls you into a tight, affectionate hug. Gross, you think to yourself. Then he starts whispering into your ear: "Listen, Maxie! Why don't you calm down a little? I'm not going to hurt you, you know? Don't be scared! I just wanna play with you." He burps again, "Don't you wanna play with me?"

You struggle to free yourself from the bully's grip, but unfortunately for you, he is older and stronger than you. To make your suffering even worse, you start noticing that he has really bad breath, as the pungent smell of peanut butter and jelly infiltrates your nose. He probably never brushes his teeth, you think. His horrible breath, mixed with the strong poop odor coming from his underwear, almost makes you want to puke.

"I'll make you an offer," he says, still holding you tightly, "How about you meet me after school today? We can have more fun then, alright? Let's say, we meet right behind the building! But I'm going to be really disappointed if you don't come."

He ruffles your hair, messing it up in the process. Even though Gary has never been outright mean to you (you even remember him protecting you from bigger kids sometimes), he's still gross and intimidating and every nice thing he says sounds more like a threat to you. Thankfully, he finally releases you. You gulp nervously and look him in the eye.

"D-do I have to?" you nervously ask him, hoping he will change his mind. "Yes, I insist!" he smiles, still pretending to be nice to you, "Don't worry, it'll be a lot of fun. I promise!" He forcefully grabs your head and says: "Here's a little taste of what we're going to do." He prepares to hock a loogie and then spits it right onto your face. "Jackpot!" he shouts gleefully. You've been trying not to puke the entire time, which has been getting harder and harder every moment, but now you can almost feel your breakfast rising from your stomach. In addition, the bus driver decides to brake hard at this exact moment. You fall forward, but luckily you manage to steady yourself on the seat in front of you.

Looking out of the window, you see that you've arrived at your school. I don't feel well, you think, holding your stomach. Gary gets out of his seat and you get out of yours. As you try to leave the bus, Gary stands right in your way. "Hey, one more thing, Maxie," he says before releasing a foul-smelling three-second burp in your face. "See ya later!" he shouts, running out of the vehicle. Horrified, you realize that you can't hold it in anymore. Despite your best efforts to get out of the bus in time, you just start throwing up right where you are. The bus driver glares at you as walk past him. "Sorry!" you mutter, giving him an apologetic look, "I just don't feel very well, I guess."

Once you've arrived at your classroom, the nauseous feeling in your stomach has mostly vanished. However, you ask yourself whether you should tell a teacher that you feel sick and need to go home, considering that it's probably the only way to avoid having another encounter with Gary after school. On the other hand, you're fully aware that in case you don't keep your appointment with him, his torture might get a lot worse in the future.

You decide that it would probably be for the best if you just endured your day at school like any other day. Furthermore, you could always change your mind later.

131221.content:
“Good.” A look of triumph passed over Mary’s face at her small victory. Truth be told, she had no doubt Gary didn’t actually need to use the bathroom, not with how eager he’d been to describe his dump upon exiting the bathroom earlier. He just didn’t want to apologize.

Then again, the apology wasn’t so much for the young boy as it was for Mary. Gary was just a big bully; a big bully who often preyed upon his sister at home. For the young girl, the near constant harassment cultured ill will towards her brother, though she did her best to hide it from her mother. Now that she finally had the upper hand, she intended to make her brother suffer, whether by telling her mother of his bullying or forcing him to apologize.

“Now come on, we’re going to go look for that boy and you’re going to apologize.” Mary turned away from her brother, walking up towards the shallow slope which led out of the water.

~~~~~~~~~~

For the next twenty minutes, Mary searched for the smaller boy whom her brother had bullied, but without success. At first, she had thought it would be easy. All she would have to do is look for someone crying and she’d find her target. However, the adults were so much taller than the seven year olds that finding anything soon proved difficult. Of course, it didn’t help that Gary started complaining after only five minutes of searching.

She’d told him off at first, threatening to go to their mother then and there if he didn’t shut up and help, but that only worked for a little while. Not only that, but by the way Gary was sulking, there was little doubt that he didn’t want to find the boy. Ten minutes later, and she was beginning to grow tired of searching as well. Mary was only seven years old after all, and it wasn’t every day that she got to go to the water park. By the twenty minute mark Gary was complaining again and Mary had lost all hope of finding the young boy, but she didn’t want to let Gary get away with what he’d done. This was her chance to get him back for all the times he’d bullied her. She refused to give up her power over him without inflicting some sort of damage.

~~~~~~~~~~

“Please Mary. We’ve been at this forever. The boy’s probably on another slide already or getting ice cream. It wasn’t that big a deal.” Gary was obviously attempting his best to sound convincing, but the result was a high pitched whine which only served to aggravate his sister further.

“Fine then, but I’m telling Mom.” Mary’s voice rose and fell as she spoke, a familiar phrase which carried a teasing sing-song to it.

“No, no, no. Please Mary.” Gary reached out to grab his twin’s arm, his face alarmed at the prospect of impending punishment.

“Let go!” Mary jerked her arm away, raising her fist in preparation to fend off her brother. Gary let go, realizing his mistake immediately. Mary held her fist up in the air menacingly, pausing for a moment to see if her brother would come at her again before continuing.

“We couldn’t find the boy, so you can’t apologize, so I’m telling Mom.”

“Please no. I’ll do anything.” From the miserable whine Gary was emitting, it was clear to Mary that he was very near tears. Perfect. The girl was very tempted to run to their mother then and there, the prospect of bringing her bully of a brother to tears was so appealing. However, Gary had said he would do anything, and Mary was curious exactly how far he would go.

“Anything?”

“Anything!” Mary’s interest sparked hope in the young boy. Perhaps his twin could be persuaded to ignore his bullying. The young girl took on a pensive appearance, tugging at stray, blond lock of hair for several seconds. The silence grew longer as the two stood close, but all the activity of the pool distracted the girl, preventing her from thinking clearly. Eventually, having failed to come up with a suitable punishment, Mary instead chose to postpone her decision.

“Fine. But I don’t know what I want, so you’re going to stay near me until I think of something.”

“Ok. But I have to go to the bathroom first.” At the words, a spark suddenly lit up within Mary’s mind. Maybe since Gary was so insistent upon going to the bathroom, he might really need to go. Satisfaction bloomed within the young girl as she spoke her next words.

“No. You’re not allowed to go to the bathroom until tomorrow.”

“What!” Gary’s voice went up an octave as he realized his sister’s ridiculous demand. Ever since he’d started walking, the crawling feeling within his lower gut had stopped, but the pressure of an impending poop had remained ever present. It was a vulgar feeling, as if some great mass were pushing on the other side of his anus, struggling to force its way out. Gary hadn’t had to poop this bad in a while, not since the dare with his friends. He didn’t know if he could hold it until tomorrow.

“That’s stupid.”

“Fine, then I’m telling.” Mary began to walk off, but Gary once more reached out to his sister.

“Wait! Fine. I’ll do it.”

“You’d better.” And with that, Mary turned and strode back towards the pool, leaving her brother fuming where he stood.

1312212.content:
Slowly, Jack began to stir; the fog of freshly restored consciousness still clouding his memory and dulling his senses. Where was he? Thoughts danced at the edge of his awareness as if there were something important he should be remembering, but as the boy reached out for them, they drifted away. What was he forgetting? Puzzlement filled the boy. Struggling to regain full consciousness, some awareness of his body slowly began to return.

The first sense to return was hearing. A dull, rhythmic pounding slowly became apparent., sounding strangely fluid in nature. Oddly enough, it seemed to come from everywhere at once, seeming to almost pulse through his body. Listening closer, muffled voices soon became apparent; unintelligible over the pounding. However, Jack's attention soon shifted as another feeling made itself apparent.
Jack was burning up. Well, he wasn't actually burning up, but it felt like it. It was as if he were stuck inside an oven, a wet, penetrating heat searing through his body and forcing him to sweat. In fact, as the boy slowly began to register his sense of feeling once more, he had a panicked moment during which he feared he might actually be inside an oven. Tight, burning walls clamped tightly upon his distorted body from all around him; the slick, slimy walls sticking to his flesh.

Weakly, Jack struggled against his surroundings, barely shuffling as he fought to regain control of his body. It seemed his body had fallen asleep to some degree, a sure sign that he was currently forced into some unnatural position, but the fear spawned from the irrational thought of being inside an oven lent him strength. Still, in his half conscious state, it was all the boy could do to press gently against his surroundings. However, the gentle give he felt confirmed he was not within an over.

A new sensation washed over Jack, relief. He knew where he was now, though why he hadn't remembered earlier was still a mystery. He was in his mother's purse. That's right, they were going to the water park. His mother had needed a way to smuggle him in. It was only logical that Jack was inside his mother's purse. He must have fallen asleep somehow. Yeah that was it. In fact, he still felt very tired. Perhaps he should go back to sleep. His mother would wake him when they got to the water park. He only had to give into the darkness that yet threatened to overtake him and he'd be dreaming in no time. However, before Jack could drift off to unconsciousness once more, a strange sound forced itself upon him.

It was a soft sound a first, nearly unintelligible from the thumping and muffled voices all about Jack; a low, bubbling groan that resonated from somewhere nearby. Jack ignored it at first, dismissing it as unimportant, however some itch at the back of his skull forced his attention upon it.

Slowly, as Jack listened, the sound grew louder. The bubbling groan soon became a wet burble, filling Jack with repulsion, before an unexpected pressure pressed itself against the top of Jacks head. It paused for a moment, bringing with it a sound reminiscent of someone playing with jell-o. However, what came next was entirely unexpected by the small boy.

A ripple shot through the walls surrounding Jack, as if he were in a tube and someone had just run their hand along the outside, and with the sudden shift the force pushed past his small form. It shot rapidly past Jacks face, slithering at a break neck speed along his belly before pressing against his groin. A second later, it flashed past his feet, disappearing somewhere below.

Jacks memories began to stir. Something was wrong. This wasn't the inside of his mother's purse. He was in some sort of tube. That's right. They had already entered the water park. He had even ridden a slide already. No wait, that wasn't right.

Unexpectedly, Jacks surroundings clenched down upon him painfully, destroying his train of thought. A moment later, realization hit him.

'Pffffft.' The wet sputtering reverberated through the boy, filling him with dread.

'Oh God!'

At least, that's what the boy tried to say. However, lacking the room to expand his lungs it came out as a desperate gurgle. Suddenly, Jack was fully awake, and fully aware of everything going on about him. The vile way the slimy walls groped at his testicles and face, the putrid slime which worked its way into his every crevice, that vulgar taste which violated his mouth, choking Jack and forcing him to gag, all this and more hit the boy with startling clarity.

OH GOD' oh God oh God oh God oh God oh God!

He was inside of someone's butt! No. This couldn't be happening. Oh please no.

Jack started to thrash as hard as he could; more a gentle sloshing than anything else given his gooey nature. He kicked and struggled, wanting to make his presence know, wanting escape from his living hell. Instead, the ribbed walls all around him suddenly clamped down, stretching the boy out and forcing his head deeper.

The dreaded thumping seemed to increase in rate, a heartbeat as Jack now recognized it, and sudden, desperate hope blossomed within the boy. If the bully's heart rate was going faster, that meant he could feel Jack. It had to. A force pushed itself against the boy from one side, and a moment later Jack recognized it as a hand. His prayer had been answered.

13122121.content:
It had been nearly an hour since Gary and Mary had split ways, and Gary was feeling rather pleased with himself. Everything seemed to be going his way, at least in his mind. He’d gotten to mess with some twerp, escape punishment, and was currently having the time of his life playing in the wave pool. Nothing could bring him down.

A slight shifting in his lower gut brought into focus the gentle weight pressing against the boy’s sphincter, giving lie to his smug assertions.

Well, almost nothing. The fact that Gary wasn’t allowed to go to the bathroom left a sour taste in his mouth. However, not because the mass within his bowels was causing him discomfort; he’d been through worse. No, it was the fact that his sister, Mary, had managed to coerce him into doing what she wanted. Gary liked to be in control of things, bullying others to make himself feel bigger and better about himself, so the fact that Mary had control over him, even for a day, irked him to no end. He was a big boy after all, and that meant that he could do whatever he wanted. A wave tumbled towards the boy, and Gary jumped up to meet it, keeping his head above water as the water rose and fell and catching a flash of his sister’s lime green swim suit.

Gary had suspected for a while now that his sister was following him, spying on him to make sure he didn’t break his promise. This too only added to Gary’s irritation. He’d seen her once or twice as he’d gone from slide to slide, always behind him in line, though a few people back. On the occasions when he’d seen her, she’d quickly tried to hide behind the person in front of her, the loud green of her one piece acting as a beacon regardless of how hard she tried to hide. So, Gary had snuck into the wave pool, hoping to give his sister the slip amongst the mass of people floating alongside him. His plan had apparently failed.

Well, Gary didn’t like the idea of running from anyone anyways. He was a big kid now. He had no reason to run from his sister. However, he couldn’t confront her either, at least not without risking her tattling to their mother. An idea hatched within the little bully’s mind, only half formed, but seeming promising to a seven-year-old’s logic. Upon riding the next wave, he sought out the lime green that would signal his sister, making his way towards her with malicious intentions.

It took a little effort to force his way through the mass of people, but soon enough Gary found himself next to his sister. At his approach, a look of alarm had overcome his sister’s face before quickly changing to distrust, confirming Gary’s earlier suspicions. So, she had been spying on him. Well, she was in for a surprise. Wearing his friendliest grin, Gary swam up to his sister.

“Hey Mary.” Gary kept his voice cheerful. Mary’s suspicion only deepened.

“What do you want Gary?” Mary knew her brother, and the kind of jerk he was. There was no way he’d actually be nice to her. He was up to something.

“Nothing much. I couldn’t find anyone my own age to play with, so I was wondering if you’d like to play with me.” It was a lie. There were boys his age all over the wave pool. However, Gary couldn’t think of anything better at the moment.

“I saw some boys around here earlier. Why don’t you play with them?” Mary obviously wasn’t buying her brother’s excuse.

“They were too old. All they wanted to do was pass around some boring ball.”

“There’s other boy’s around.” Mary cut straight through Gary’s lies, sending the boy scrambling.

“Yeah, but I don’t feel like playing with them. So, why don’t we play together?” Gary knew he was laying it on thick, but he had neither the class nor the finesse to weave a better lie. Not only that, but his guts felt as if they were shifting slightly, filling the boy with the urge to poop. Distracted as he was, all Gary could do was hope that his sister would take the bait.

“You just want to get on my good side so I don’t tell on you.”

“Does it matter? I’m offering to be nice. Besides, I don’t see you playing with anyone.” Mary was a quiet girl, preferring to play by herself. Thus, it was no surprise that Gary had found her all alone, drifting in the wave pool and watching her brother. Though Gary didn’t know it, Mary was enjoying the idea of getting back at her brother far more than the water park itself, and thus had decided to spy on him for the rest of their time at the water park. The prospect of seeing her brother squirm up close was very appealing for the young girl.

“Ok, fine. But we do what I want.” Mary was enjoying the little bit of power she held over her twin brother, and was eager for more. Of course, Gary would refuse. It was just the way he was. However Mary knew her demands for control would only make her brother angry and she was just happy to get to frustrate him.

Of course, Mary’s demands for control did indeed frustrate her brother. However, he managed to control the outburst which nearly broke free. Gary’s plan was simple, if not fully fleshed out. He was going to sabotage his sister’s time at the water park in secret, ruining her fun without inciting her anger. However, in order to achieve his goal, he needed to be close to his sister, ready for whatever opportunity should arise. For that, he had to get closer to his sister and gain her trust, and although he hated the idea of letting her boss him around, he had no choice but to let her do it if he wanted to get the opportunity to mess with her without getting in trouble. Besides, it would be more fun to let Mary think she was in control, only to prove her wrong at the best possible moment.

“Fine.” As he spoke, a shiver ran through Gary, followed by a familiar pressure pushing against his anus: a fart. Using his apparent submission as a cover, the boy drew closer to his sister, acting as if he were moving in to hear better over the noise of the crowd. However, once he was close enough, he flexed his rectum, forcing the air bubble free from his body. It was a start.

The girl, however, took no notice of her brother’s suppressed grin or the mild stench which soon followed as she paused for a moment in mild shock. She had been ready for arguing, refusal, and any manner of defiance from her brother, but she hadn’t actually thought he would give in to her demands. The surprise was enough to set the girl to thinking. Perhaps Gary really was trying to be nice?

The thought came and went in a heartbeat.

Of course Gary was being nice. After all, he was afraid she would tell their mother what he’d been up to. Still, it would be nice to boss her brother around for a change. However, Mary wasn’t so quick to trust her brother. She first needed to test her brother, to at least understand how far he was willing to go.

“Um… Ok then. How about a piggy back ride?” Inwardly, Gary cringed at his sister’s words. She wanted him to haul her fat butt around on his back? As Gary’s false smile slipped, he quickly forced back into place, only to have it shatter at the sensations which soon overcame him

Like a startled animal, his bowels suddenly erupted in a flurry of motion, an undulating cascade of sensations which threatened to overwhelm him. The urge to poop quickly overcame the boy, stronger than he’d ever felt before, along with a sharp pain which shot through his lower belly. It felt like something was fighting to break free, threatening to force its way from within his ass. Gary’s heartbeat began to rise and his breath came in short bursts. What was happening? Hunching over, Gary placed his hand against his stomach. A gentle rumbling vibrated against his hand in answer.

“Are you OK?” Worry filled Mary at the look which suddenly flashed across her brother’s face. It was a look of pain and alarm that she’d only see him make since the time he’d broken his arm. Forgetting her plans for revenge, the girl hesitantly sauntered over to her brother’s side, putting a hand on his shoulder.

“No, I’m not OK! I feel like I’m going to poop myself. It hurts.” Gary’s voice was strained with raw emotion, however his words immediately squashed any pity his sister might have felt for him. It was obvious to Mary that her brother was faking, trying to get her to let him use the bathroom.

“Don’t you lie. You just came here to get me to let you use the bathroom. You didn’t have any intention of actually being nice to me… Well, forget it. If you want to go to the bathroom, then you go, but I’m telling mom on you.” Mary was mad now. Not only did her brother bully her at home, but here he was, trying to be her friend so he could betray her trust. Though it didn’t surprise Mary, for some reason it hurt much more. However, as Mary watched, her brother refused to drop his act. Instead, he slowly turned away before waddling towards the bathrooms, barely acknowledging a wave as it crashed into his back.

Gary was unable to straighten as he waddled, the cramps flaring through his stomach causing him too much discomfort. The sensations surging through his bowels were foreign, alien. The boy felt something akin to a bubbling sensation, as if a gas pocket were pressing its way through his lower intestine. Not only that, but a poking, prodding feeling perforated his rectum, making him feel all tingly throughout his belly. By the time the boy exited the water and made his way towards the stalls, the tingling sensation had grown, now accompanied by a low warmth burning through his abdomen. Not only that, but for some reason this strange sensation had spread throughout his penis, bringing into stark awareness the sensation of his member rubbing against the netting of his trunks.

His sister’s warnings barely registered as he opened the bathroom door, barely taking in the low light and the wet floor before he slammed the door behind him and rushed to the toilet. As his trunks hit the floor, Gary simply stepped out of them, discarding them in his haste for the promised release of the porcelain throne before him.

'Gary' are you OK?' Mary's voice penetrated the door almost hesitantly. Though she had been angry at her brother earlier, she was starting to have second doubts. She knew her brother despised to get into trouble with their mother, and from past experiences she knew the great lengths to which he was willing to go to avoid punishment. Gary's blatant disregard of her threats to go to their mother had set off alarm bells in the mind of the young girl.

Still seated upon the toilet, Gary could sense the unexpected note of concern carried within his sister's voice. However, whereas normally he would have scorned or abused his sister's concern, in his current state of fright, Gary was glad for his sister's concern. Hesitantly, Gary made his way to the door, pausing for a moment to step once more into his trunks. After a short while, Mary heard the clock of the door unlocking, shortly followed by the rattling of the doorknob and the image of her brother's face peeking through a crack in the door.

'Gary' You don't look so good.' To Mary, her brother's face looked pale, almost frightened. The young girl felt a twinge of worry in response.

'I think something's wrong with me. Can you go get mom?' Gary didn't know what was going on. The uncontrolled contraction and flooding of either pleasure or pain, he still couldn't decide, had frightened Gary to the point that he was willing to risk getting in trouble, if only for the comfort his mother would provide him. Unbeknownst to Gary, however, the thought of Gary going to their mother had sent a tremor of selfish concern through Mary.

When Mary had demanded that her brother refrain from going to the bathroom, she had had no idea that it could have caused him so much discomfort.
