"No, I wanna hear it. Whatever it is you're wanting to do, I can at least give it a try", you said, expecting for her to want to do some kind of girly activity. Probably play dress up or playing with dolls or something.

"Well... me and my friends were talking and... um, is it alright if we..."
131231111211.title: Sleepover

1312311112111.content:
You blushed heavily at Mary's request. "Y-you want to what?"

"W-well... they asked how I met you, and they wanted to see if you'd make a good seat cushion. And, um, I kinda did, too...", Mary said, a bit embarrassed at her request.

"Yeah, I wanna see how comfy you are", Stacy said, pulling you over to her before turning around and setting her jean-clad butt on top of your head.

You whimpered a bit before Mary's cousin yanked you away. "No way. I wanna sit on him first. That couch is all dirty and I'm not sitting on the cold hard floor", Jenny said as she shoved her rear in your face before you were pulled away by another girl, and then another.

As four of Mary's friends continued to fight over you, you had soon become more acquainted with the girls' butts than you had with the rest of them. You didn't particularly care for them dragging you around like a toy, but your protests were distorted among them arguing and your face being slammed into their butts trying to sit on you before being yanked away by another girl.

"Hey! You cut it out right now!", Mary yelled as she pulled you away. "He didn't even answer yet, and you're upsetting him!"

The girls lowered their heads and apologized to you. "S-sorry about that, Jack. I guess I got carried away... again", said Stacy. Carly and Emma also apologized, though Carly was a bit less sincere.

"I still wanna see how comfy he is", Jenny pouted.

Mary gave her cousin an angry look before looking down at you. "I don't wanna make you do something you don't want to, so it's up to you, Jack", Marilynn said.

"W-well... I guess it's okay. I mean, it's not like it'll hurt me or anything", you replied, causing the girls' faces to light up. As they all reached for you, you spoke up to stop them. "B-but Mary gets to do it, first!"

While the girls' smiles fell a bit, Mary squealed and gave you a big hug before sticking your tongue out at her friends. "That's no fair!", Jenny cried. "Of course he's gonna choose you!"


"Too bad. You're just gonna have to deal with it", Mary teased as she set you down and turned around, her cotton pajama-clad butt cheeks filling your vision before she sat down. As she put more weight on you, your face was wedged deeper into her crack as the rest of your body made a long, humorous *SQUEELLCH* as she lowered her rear into your malleable form. The smell wasn't particularly pleasant, but far from horrible, and you've been through worse. You still weren't all too thrilled with the idea of serving as a seat cushion for all five of these little girls, but Mary was nice, and she wasn't going to let anything too bad happen to you. After your new little girlfriend had completely sat down, she wiggled her bum on top of you and giggled as you made a perfect mold of her butt. "Wow, you're super comfy, Jackie! No wonder I didn't hurt my butt falling down the slide", she laughed.

Jenny crossed her arms and pouted, wanting to use you before anyone else. "Hmph. Well what am I supposed to do?", she whined, as the other three girls had quickly taken up the couch. Your hearing was a bit muffled underneath Mary's cheeks, but for some reason, you could tell that this girl was going to give you a hard time.

"Hmm... Guess you'll have to sit on the floor", Mary said as she ate some candy while another movie came on.

"But it's cold and hard", her cousin replied.

"Not to me, cause I've got a sweet, comfy, boy-cushion", Mary laughed as she wiggled her rear on top of you. Her cousin simply shoved herself in between the other girls as they ate popcorn and watched the movie.

You couldn't see anything from underneath Mary, but from what you could understand, it was a movie about an all-girl band who traveled the world and struggled to stay together despite everything. About ten minutes into the movie, you could hear Mary and her friends talking, about you, it seemed. "But he said he was okay with it! And besides, Jenny's right. It isn't fair that only you get to use him", Emma said.

"Well, he's my boyfriend, so that means I can if I want", Mary said as she turned around, still seated, so her butt cause your face to twist along with her. You started to reconsider agreeing to be her cushion as they continued arguing.



After the movie had gotten to the point where the lead singer considered leaving the band over a guy (how coincidental), the girls seemed to come to an agreement. "Alright, so after the movie's over, we can switch", Carly said.

"But Jackie gets to choose! No more fighting over him, alright?", Mary said.

"Alright!", the girls said in unison as they went back to watching the movie, Mary turning back and twisting your face once again, more or less back to how it was before.

"You're the sweetest boy ever, you know that, Jackie?", Mary whispered down to you, causing your squished body to turn bright red. She had remained sat on you for a couple of hours, shifting to get to a comfortable position and wiggling on top of you, getting up only once to get some more snacks, leaving you behind for the girls to giggle at your butt-printed form before Mary had taken her seat on top of you once again. Once the movie was over Mary had kept her word and lifted her rear up for one of her other friends to take a seat on her boy-cushion.

"Hey, what gives? I thought you were gonna let us use him next", Stacy asked, a bit of laughter in her voice.

"Huh? What're you talking about? He's right the-" Mary pointed to the floor where she had sat, but you were nowhere to be found. She then turned around to see if you had come up with her, and sure enough, there you were, reduced to a gooey splatter on her butt. The girls started to laugh at the sight of you, but quickly stopped so as to not upset either you or Mary. She giggled a bit herself before peeling you off. As you slowly reformed, Mary had informed you of the deal they had made and asked if you were okay with it.

"Uh, s-sure. It wasn't too bad", you replied as you regained your regular shape.

"Great! So, who gets to use you now?", Mary asked.

You thought about it for a bit. Stacy and Jenny seemed to want to sit on you the most, so if you had to choose, it'd probably be one of them. Stacy appeared to be a lot nicer, but she went overboard when she was having fun, as you had found out earlier. Jenny looked to be a total brat, though. Then again, if you let her use you, she might be nicer to you, but it might be tough to convince her to give you up as well. To be honest, you weren't completely on board with the idea of your entire experience over here being limited to the girls' butts, but you didn't want to upset them, too.

"Well, who's it gonna be?", Jenny asked, rather impatiently.

You struggled with the decision a bit, not wanting to upset anyone, but still not totally up for this. "Umm... I guess..."
1312311112111.title: Comfy Cushion

choices: He uses you for a prank.
He decides to eat you himself.
131231111212.content:
"I'm sorry, Jack, but Mary and her friends won't be back for at least another hour", Tina said as you grabbed your things.

"Oh, well, I guess I can come back later, then", you said, about to walk back outside to your mother's car before your new little girlfriend's mother stopped you.

"Actually, it's a good thing you're early. Maybe you can help me with something", Tina said as she led you back inside. "You remember Gary, right?", she asked.

"Um, y-yes, ma'am", you answered politely, though timidly. The last time you saw him, he had flattened you into a design on the back of his underwear. "He was picking on me at the park."

"Yes, he's a little bit... tough to get along with", Tina said. "I know he isn't exactly the nicest boy, but maybe if he had a friend, he might warm up to people a bit more", she said as she lead you into the hallway.

"Are you... wanting me to be his friend?", you asked. "B-but he's too rough! He'll try to squish me, or stomp on me, or..." You were interrupted by Tina putting a finger over your lips.

"Jack, listen. I know he's a little rowdy, but I promise he won't do anything bad to you. I already told him that if he tried anything, he'd be grounded for the rest of the weekend."


You were extremely relieved upon hearing that. The last thing you wanted was for him to turn you into a splatter on the floor, or worse. "Well... I did bring some video games. Maybe he'll like those..."

"Great! His room is right down the hall. You'll know it when you see it", Tina said as she took your pillow and blanket, leaving you with your backpack full of video games.

Even though Tina said Gary wouldn't do anything mean to you, that didn't keep you from having a bad feeling in the pit of your stomach as you walked to his room. She was right, you thought as you headed toward the door covered in skulls and zombie stickers. Almost the second you opened the door, your ears were assaulted by an angry shout followed by an x-box controller hitting the wall. "STUPID CAMPERS!", he yelled before seeing you in his doorway. "Hey, you're that gooey kid from yesterday", he said as he walked up to you. "Guess you're here for my dumb sister's sleepover, huh?"

"Uh, um, y-yeah.But your mom said we could play until- H-hey!" You yelped as Gary suddenly poked you hard, digging his finger deep into the top of your head. "S-stop it, that hurts!"

"Hah! Guess your buddy isn't here to help you out", Gary said as he pulled his finger out, laughing as he watched your head reform.

"Please don't do that", you said.

"Or what?", Gary said as he grabbed your face and started squishing it together. "What're YOU gonna do?", Gary said as he shut his door. His TV was rather loud, so his mother wouldn't hear what was going on unless you cried out to her, which would be rather difficult in your current position. You flailed around and let out muffled cries as he squished your face in his fist. "You're not gonna do nothing, 'cause I'm big and strong and you're just a squishy little wimp." He laughed as he pushed you down.

You focused on reforming your face to try and cry out for Tina as he continued taunting you. "You're lucky my momma said I couldn't do anything to you, or you'd be spending the day under my butt", he said.

As much as you didn't want to play with this bully, you didn't want him to pick on you every time you came over either. You felt a connection with Mary, and you didn't want it to be ruined by her obnoxious twin brother. You had to stand up for yourself. Without thinking, you quickly jump on top of Gary, trying to put him in a chokehold, but your weak, squishy arms did very little to him.

"You wanna wrestle, huh? Guess mom didn't say anything about that", he said as he grabbed you and tossed you to the ground. He tried to stomp on you, but you rolled out of the way. After dodging him, you jump back on him and start biting his arm. "Hey HEY! Biting's not fair", he said as he grabbed your arm. "Let's see how you like it", he said as he bit down into your soft, gooey flesh, just in time for you to regret jumping him. He opened his eyes wide as he continued digging his teeth into you. He then bit harder and ripped a chunk of your arm out and chewed it up a little bit before swallowing. "Mmm! Man, you taste great, squishy!", he said as he licked his lips. As the chunk of your arm filled back in, you were terrified of what Gary was thinking.
131231111212.title: Forced to make a friend

1312311112121.content:
A devilish grin formed on Gary's face as he figured out what to do with his sister's squishy little boyfriend. "Hehe, I just got the funniest idea for you, squishy", Gary said as he lifted you up.

"G-gary, I'm sorry! I was just... I was trying to act tough!", you cried before Gary tossed you on the ground, reducing you to a gooey splatter.

"Hah! That's funny. You're not tough, and you're never gonna be tough, so you might as well quit while you're ahead", the boy said as he gathered your mess of a form off of the floor. "You know, mom got upset at me the other day for eating all the candy in the house...", he said as he began compressing you into a little ball. "...I got grounded for the whole day. Buuutt...", he continued, rolling you around in his hand. "...since you're so nice and sweet, you'd be happy to help her out, wouldn't you?" You started wondering what Gary meant as he kept rolling your tiny balled up body in his hands, carrying you over to some kind of weird contraption. You recognized it as a candy-making lab, the same kind that your mom got you for your birthday one year. You didn't like where this was going one bit. As he opened the lid, he continued verbally tormenting you as he brought you over. "You're gonna help me make some special candy for her, squishy. And this candy's gonna have a special ingredient... you!" With that he dropped you into a small vat of bright red syrup, taking a pair of tweezers and rolling you around, making sure you had a nice even coating. You mentally panicked as he dunked you in the candy red syrup, the sticky substance soaking into your tiny little ball form. You wanted to cry out to him, begging for the bully to stop this. You didn't want to be turned into a piece of candy! "Okay, looks like you've got a nice little coating. Now to cool you off..."

Gary then took you over to a small fan he had set up in the corner and let the cool air blow over you. You could feel your candy coating hardening all around you, giving your view of the world a red tint. It didn't take long for the syrup around you to harden, essentially turning you into a candy-coated gummy ball! "Hahaha, looks like my little candy's all nice and hard!", Gary laughed. "Now to give you over to mom." The boy took a small square of clear plastic off of his shelf and placed you inside, wrapping you tightly and making you look just like a piece of candy that would be bought at a store. Gary hummed as he walked over to his mom, tossing you in the air and catching you a couple of times as he brought you over to Tina. "Hey mom, I found an extra piece of candy. Sorry about eating most of it the other day", Gary said as he held you up.

"Why thank you, sweetie! I've been craving one of these all day", Tina said as she kissed her son on the forehead.

Gary gave you one last smirk as he handed you to his mother before he headed off.

"Oh, and Gary", Tina called out. "I hope you're being nice to your sister's little friend."

"Uh, yeah. We're getting along great. He brought over some of his video games", Gary said. "They're pretty sweet", he said, trying hard to keep from laughing.

Tina nodded in approval and started to unwrap your plastic prison. Your candy prison prevented you from making any noise, but if you could, you would cry out and tell her how horrible her son was treating you. The woman plucked you from the plastic wrapper and licked her lips as she eyed your candied form, looking to you like a monster eager to mercilessly consume you. You wanted at this point to miraculously burst through your candy shell and punch Gary right in the face. However, Tina soon brought an end to your daydreaming. She quickly popped you into her mouth and licked your candy-coated body. You could hear her voice echo all around you, delighting in your flavor as your coating was slowly dissolved by her saliva. Your fears were soon intensified as her tongue moved you underneath her molars. You mentally whimpered as you prepared for what was next. With one quick motion, Tina's teeth came crashing down, shattering your candy coating and pulverizing your poor squishy body.

"Mmm! This little piece has a chewy center. Nice!", Tina's voice boomed. You were absolutely pulverized by her teeth as she chewed you up like the piece of candy that you were, soaking you in her saliva. You swear you could hear Gary snickering from behind the corner, pleased with his handiwork. After chewing you up for a few minutes, Tina had decided that she was done with you and swallowed. You panicked as you were squeezed down her throat before landing with a splash in her belly, the hot stomach juices sloshing over you. You tried your best to reform, but your body had taken such a beating that you weren't able to manage much of anything. The contents of Tina's stomach splashed around as she patted her belly, satisfied with the delicious little candy. She had no idea that she had just eaten her daughter's little friend.

=================

You had sat in there for about an hour, uselessly attempting to reform as you sat in the gut of your new little girlfriend's mother. You could hear Tina go about her day, making rice crispy treats for Mary's sleepover and mixing fruit punch for when the girls returned from dance class. Needless to say, you were pretty upset at your current situation. You figured this was sort of your fault. What were you thinking trying to defend yourself? That never worked out before and it sure as hell didn't work out this time. You should have ran and tattled on Gary. Sure, it would have been the wimpy thing to do, but that's kind of exactly what you are: a squishy little wimp, just like Gary said.

Suddenly, you could hear the cheerful voices of several little girls enter the house, one of them you immediately recognized as Mary. You wanted desperately to cry out to her from you position in her mother's belly, but you could only let out a slight gurgle. "Is he really as cute as you say he is?", you heard one girl ask.

"Oh, he's just adorable! And he's just the sweetest little guy in the world. I can't wait for you to meet him", you heard Mary said as she and her friends ran into the house. "Mom, we're home!", Mary called out. "Where's Jackie?"

"Hi sweetie", Tina greeted as she walked up and hugged her daughter. "I had your little friend play with Gary while he waited for you. It looks like they're getting along pretty well. I haven't heard a peep from them all day", she said, making you mentally groan at just how wrong she was. You started to panic as you felt an odd suction. Your bad situation was about to get much worse, as you felt Tina's stomach contents drain into her intestines, carrying you with it. You were about to take an extremely humiliating trip through Tina's digestive system, and Gary was the only one who knew where you were!

Unaware of your plight, Mary shrugged her shoulders and walked to her room where her friends were getting dressed into their pajamas to change out of her leggings as well. She took a quick peak in her brother's room to see how you were doing. Mary found the idea of anyone getting along with her brother to be too good to be true. However, she only saw her twin. There was no sign of her cute little boyfriend. She immediately (correctly) assumed that her brother had done something to you. "Gary!", she screamed as she kicked the door open, causing her brother to jump up from his video game in shock. "Where's Jackie?!", she yelled.

"Who, what? Dunno who you're talking about. Sounds like some loser", Gary said as he went back to his game. Mary jumped in front of the TV and turned it off, interrupting his game. "Hey, what the heck?! I just captured the enemy base! We were about to win!",

"Mom told me Jackie was up here playing with you and I don't see him anywhere. What did you do with him?", she asked.

Gary contemplated what to do. There wasn't any way he could lie and get away with it. He was going to get in trouble no matter what. If he told his sister what happened to you, it would make for a hilarious scene to watch her try to fish you out of the toilet. If he kept quiet, you would have to make your way through the sewer system. Unless something went wrong and you ended up trapped in his mom's butt, which would also be funny as heck.

Unfortunately for you, your fate was in Gary's hands.
1312311112121.title: Tina's Special Candy

choices: Mary asks her brother where you are.
Nothing happens. He's left alone to digest you.
1312311112122.content:
You trembled in fear as Gary licked his lips. You knew what he was thinking of, and you really wished you were somewhere else right now. "Hey, Squishy, guess what time it is?", Gary asked.

"*gulp* I-I dunno...", you manage to stammer out.

"It's lunch time!", Gary says, wanting to have as much fun with this as possible. "Wanna know what's for lunch?"

"G-gary, please *gulp* ... please don't-"

"That's right! It's you!", Gary laughed before pulling you out in front of him biting into your shoulder and ripping a chunk out.

"Gary, stop! I'm not food!", you screamed as you began to hit him in a weak attempt to get him to let you go.

The bully only laughed as he gulped the bit of you down before biting another chunk out of you. He had already made up his mind that you were food, and there wasn't anything you could do to keep him from getting you in his belly. You tried punching him in the face, but he simply opened his mouth, causing you to go elbow deep into the seven year-old's throat before he snapped his teeth shut, severing your limb and leaving you with a stump. Not wanting to lose any more of your body, you begin kicking him in the stomach.


"Oof!", Gary groans as you give him a good, hard (for you, anyway) kick to the gut, making him fall over and let go of you. You tried to run off, but he quickly grabbed your leg. "Haha, looks like my lunch tried to get away", he laughed as he pulled you closer to him as he grabs your other leg. "Guess I'll have to scarf it down." With that, he squished your feet together and shoved them into his mouth as he began to eat more of your body. The bully pulls you in deeper before he chomps down on your shins, chewing up your malleable body and savoring the taste as you attempted to crawl away from him with your one fully formed arm and screaming to get away, but the boy simply turned up the volume of the TV. Gary always got a kick out of picking on kids that were smaller and weaker than him, especially if he got to do something gross to them. To him, getting to eat a whimpy little boy and force him to endure his digestive system was the funniest thing ever, and the fact that you were his sister's boyfriend made it that much better. You tasting like his favorite dessert was even more of a bonus.

"G-gary, please!", you pleaded as he continued to eat multiple chunks of you, now up to your waist. "I promise if you stop now, I won't tell your mom! I-I-I'll just say it was an accident or something!", you cried out, tears running down your face.

"*gulp* Mmm... But if I eat all of you, you won't be able to tell, anyway", he said as he grabbed your head and pressed your face into his belly. "You can't tell her anything if you're in my tummy, stupid", he laughed as he grabbed your other arm, the only appendage that wasn't in his gut and shoved it down his gullet before biting down and swallowed, leaving you as only a torso with stumps for arms. You cried as you watched the lump travel down his throat, making you completely helpless now. "Haha, you should see how pathetic you look", he said as he picked you up. "Hey, why aren't you struggling, lunch? It's not as fun if you don't fight back", he said, a bit annoyed that you were just sitting there. "Well, trying to fight back, anyway. Heh, guess you realized I'm just too strong to fight me, huh? Shoulda figured that out earlier", he said as he casually took a bite out of your shoulder. "*gulp* It's a good thing you're gonna survive. That means I can make you my lunch forever!", he said cheerfully as he took another bite out of you. "*gulp* Ooh! And I can also make you my breakfast, and dinner, and dessert, and appetizer..." You cringed each time he named another meal that he could think of having you, filling your head with images of the little bully preparing you in different ways to be his meal. Frozen into ice cream, cooked into an omelette, baked into a cake. That wasn't what you wanted your life to be, but it seemed like you didn't have a say in the matter.


Finally, Gary had munched on you until only your head was left wiping your tear-soaked face onto his shirt before holding you up to his mouth. "Any last words?", Gary asked as he licked his lips. You simply shut your eyes tightly and tried to turn away. "Hmph. Fine, be that way", he pouted before his mouth returned to a twisted smile as he shoved your head into his slimy mouth. As he began chewing, your senses were assaulted with his horrid breath. If you weren't being mashed to oblivion by his teeth, you'd gag. "Mmm!", Gary moaned, his voice reverberating all around you as he continued to chew up his living lunch. After chewing you for a few minutes, he finally swallowed, squeezing you tightly through his esophagus before your head joined the rest of your body, which had already started melting.

"Mmm-mmm! You sure hit the spot, Squishy", Gary laughed as he patted his belly, causing you to slosh around. "Better get used to your new room. You're gonna spend a LOT of time in there."

Gary's taunting was interrupted by the sound of the front door opening and the giggling of several little girls. "What?! They weren't supposed to be back until..." The boy quickly looked at his zombie alarm clock and saw that, indeed, over an hour had passed since you had arrived. "Guess I had a little too much fun there. Oh well. Not like they're gonna find out where you are anyway", Gary giggled as he jiggled his belly, making him laugh as he felt you slosh around. As your world shook around you, all you could do was hope that someone noticed you were missing and saved you from your disgusting fleshy prison.
1312311112122.title: Food for the bully

13123111121223.content:
You were in pure hell right now, trapped in the stomach of a 7 year old bully who had no intention of ever letting his squishy meal go anytime soon. "How you doing in there squishy?"Gary laughs patting his stomach, you wished that you could somehow hurt him but you knew well enough that your body was just to squishy and soft to do any damage, you were completely at his mercy. "Gary is Jack in here?"Mary asks entering her brother's room. "I'm in here!!!! You stupid brother swallowed me!!!"You mentally yell hopping somehow she would be able to tell where you were. Last thing you wanted was to be stuck as this disgusting kid's toy.

"Oh Squishy? He said he had to go home for some reason, I didn't ask for what."Gary lies, trying his hardest not to smile. "He's lying!!!!"You mentally scream trying to move your melting body, if you could just make his stomach move she would have to notice..........right. "Brrrrrrrrrppppppppppp!!!!!!"Gary belches directly into his sister's face. "EWWWWWWWWW!!!!!!"Mary yells running out of the room in disgust, "Gary that's gross!". "Look's like you're giving me some gas squishy."Gary whispers to his gut laughing as he begins to put on his pjs. He reaches into one of his dresser drawers and pulls out.............
13123111121223.title: Nothing happens. He's left alone to digest ...

choices: Gary starts to laugh (He was kidding)
You feel him squat down (Not kidding!)
131231111212231.content:
You torment just got a thousand times worst when you heard a all to familiar crinkling sound, even inside Gary's stomach it was clear as day, he was putting on a diaper! Now to a normal person this wouldn't be a bad thing, heck some kids would find it funny, but to you it was awful. Since your body could be melted and turned into a liquid you could easily be absorbed by the disposable garment and have more times then you would like to say........mostly from one of Stevie's. Thankfully someone always found you and got you out of it within a hour or 2. But that was at home, here Gary had already established that you were now his. Your fate was in the hands of someone younger then you!

As you panic over the realization of your possible fate you and the rest of Gary's stomach contents begin to empty into his intestine. "No please I don't want to go out this way!!!"You mentally scream, but it was to late. You were now on your way to be pooed out by this disgusting brat. Outside Gary had finished putting on his thick nighttime diaper when he felt his stomach empty causing a big smile to appear on his face. "Just can't wait to become my poo can you squishy?"He mocks patting the back of his diaper before putting pajama pants over them."Shouldn't be to long now,"He smirks jumping into his bed, "how about some tv to pass the time?" He turns on his tv and starts watching cartoons.

*2 hours pass*

The last 2 hours had been a living nightmare for you. Your body had been squeezed and crushed by the walls of the brat's intestine as the stuff around you turned into poo, it smelled horrible. You had spent the last 10 minutes encased in a big smelly turd, at this point you were praying that he had to go because you did not want to be stuck like this. Outside Gary was laughing at a episode of spongebob before he heard a rumble from his stomach and felt a all to familiar need. "Looks like it's time to let you out Squishy."He laughs as he gets up, his diaper giving off a crinkle. That gave him an idea, "You know squishy this thing is also suppose to cover up other accidents."He smiles, "Maybe I should just release you into it instead of the toilet." Your immediately panic, was your fear coming true?
131231111212231.title: A nighttime diaper (bedwetter)

choices: "Ok this maybe wasn't the best idea." (Gary immediately regrets his choice)
"Having fun in there Squishy? (Gary loved his choice)
1312311112122312.content:
"Well I wouldn't want to waste this opportunity."Gary chuckles as he squats down, "Ready to come out Squishy?" You worst fear was indeed coming true, "Nooooooooo!!!!!!!!"You mentally scream as you feel your smelly prison begin to move, all the while hearing your captor grunting as he pushed out the waste that you were trapped in. "Come on Squishy..........time to go in the diaper!"He grunts laughing as he continues to push, "It's all nice and soft!" So, with this in mind, you figured that maybe if you comforted Gary he'd be nicer to you, or at least stop making so many threats to squish you.

Plus, you were nine years old, so you felt more comfortable around boys than girls, even when those boys seemed like total bullies. After all, Ash had eaten you like a piece of candy that one Halloween, but after he... 'let you out'... he had apologized and cleaned you up before bringing you home, and now... "Hey, uh, Gary, are you okay?" You asked, looking over at him.

Too tightly for your liking, in fact, and you started to struggle as your body began to deform from the pressure.

Your body, however, had fully entered Mary's mouth, and was essentially squeezed into a mold of the inside of Mary's mouth, teeth and all, which stopped the air from ever leaving Mary's convulsing esophagus. You tried to wiggle your way out of Mary's slimy maw as she coughed a third time, desperately trying one last time to spit you out as her tongue bucked underneath you. Not only did this not free you from your increasingly-uncomfortable position, but as you wiggled your head you further agitated Mary's uvula, causing her to gag - and, having already exhausted her lungs' supply of air trying to cough you out of her mouth, her throat suddenly began convulsing in the opposite direction, pulling you further into the dark abyss of Mary's esophagus with an uncomfortable *GULP*.

Mary had been too focused on trying to stop the Ferris wheel cart from shaking with all of Gary's sudden movement to realize what had happened until it was too late, and no matter how much she tried to cough you out, she just couldn't manage to spit you out. Her tongue convulsing against you sent your flavor directly to her brain, unconsciously telling her mind that what she was choking on was a delicious mouthful of tasty dessert, causing her mouth to salivate even more, getting you even wetter and slipperier than you already were. As your struggling disturbed her uvula even more, her gag reflex kicked in, and she winced as she was forced to swallow hard in a desperate attempt to breathe.

You wanted out of her and fast. You thought Mary might try to cough you up, but she didn't seem to want to do that. It hurt that your new friend was willing to leave you in her stomach, but you were sure she was really sorry about it and that made it a little better.

As soon as Mary stepped out of the girl's bathroom, her brother was waiting. 'Did you puke him up? Was he gross and stinky? I bet he cried.'

'No! I didn't throw him up!' Mary said with disgust. Girls don't puke, only boys do after they ride the teacup ride too many times or eat too much pizza. Girls were more refined then that, they didn't do gross stuff like throw up even if they had a cute boy in their stomach.

'My tummy is not gross and Jack doesn't hate me, right Jack?' She patted her belly several times, the doughy flesh wobbling slightly which Mary took as you agreeing with her. Gary rolled his eyes. He was convinced it had to be very unpleasant for you in his sister's stomach and she was just fooling herself. Your whole predicament was absolutely hilarious to him and he only regretted that he hadn't eaten you instead. He wanted to get a chance to try eating you next after you came out of Mary. The kid isn't going anywhere, lets go play around.'

As you wait on the soft, pleather seat in the cart, the heat was beginning to melt you a bit. "Maybe I should've put extra sunscreen on like mom said", you mentally groaned to yourself. Your heart (or approximation of one) skipped a beat as you suddenly felt the cart stop, hoping that the twins were going to help you out, if they even saw you. You noticed that the heat had lightened up. If you weren't facing into the seat, you would have noticed the shadow looming over you as well.

*SPLAT!*
Your hope of being saved is crushed as a pair of plump ass cheeks quickly descend upon you, squishing you flat into the soft plastic seat. You can barely make out the chatter of several girls around you as the girl on top of you grinds her ass into you to get comfortable.
"Hey, the seats are way comfier than last time we were here", says the girl who's sat on top of you. She's a very attractive dark-skinned brunette, about 17 years old with blonde highlights and wearing a trendy bikini, though the bottom of her swimsuit is a bit too small, barely holding in her plump bubble butt.
"What are you talking about, Hailey? They're just as stiff as usual", one of the girl's friends tells her.
"Heh, guess I'm the lucky one, then. The good seat's all mine", she laughed as she wiggled her booty into the seat and you, smearing your gooey form all over her ass.

As Hailey continues to sit on you, you're forced to listen to them gossip about boys and other girls who weren't in their clique.
"Seriously? Crocs? Why don't you just shove a couple of plastic bags on your feet and call it a fucking day?!", one of the girls says, the group having been talking about a less popular girl at school.
"Ugh! Some people have no self-respect", Hailey says as she shifts her weight on top of you again.
These girls seemed so mean. The entire time you were being sat on, all they did was talk bad about other girls, and occasionally complain about their parents not giving them the stuff they wanted. You weren't sure if you wanted to be found by any of them.

Suddenly, the ride came to a stop and you heard the door open.
"Alright, girls, time to get out. Someone else's turn", one of the park staff said.
"Already? Ugh, fine", Hailey groaned as she stood up. A loud ripping sound was heard and the girl looked behind her, but didn't see anything and walked off. While you could see behind her, everything was bouncing and wobbling, making you disoriented as your vision moved with the jiggling of her massive cheeks. Unfortunately for you, while your eyes were visible on the back of her bikini bottom, no one was going to notice that they weren't part of the fabric. It just so happened that cartoon-themed swimwear was in style now, with Hailey wearing a bikini bottom depicting various people as if they had been crushed by her ass, with you looking like a cartoon splattered across her booty. You were literally a victim of fashion.

Try as you might to get someone's attention, they just gawk and stare at the popular girl.
"Damn, I'd kill to be in that guy's shoes", you hear one guy say.
You had no idea what they were talking about; you simply assumed that they knew you were stuck to the girl and just didn't want to help you. After about an hour of struggling, and having been sat on again multiple times, you had given up. You were just going to have to get off on your own.

After attempting to free yourself for what feels like forever, you hear a voice over the intercom.
"ATTENTION PARK-GOERS. WE WILL BE CLOSING IN TEN MINUTES."
"Aww. We haven't gotten on all the rides, though!", one of Hailey's friends whined.
"*sigh* Come on, let's go get dressed", another girl said.
This was bad. If you didn't free yourself now, you were going to be stuck with this mean girl possibly forever... or at least until the bikini you were stuck to wasn't in style anymore.

You wriggle your flattened form and try with all your might to free yourself. Because you've consistently made efforts to peel yourself off, you aren't ingrained into the fabric, but in your current state, you're still stuck pretty well. It's going to be a while before you're free, but when, exactly, are you able to get out of your current situation?

And before you ask, he's reading on a Junior High school level." The man looked scared. "Umm... y-yes of course. Jus... just right this way. Parents, if I could have you wait in the back of the room so as not to interfere with testing." When you got to your desk, you found it to be too high up. The younger children laughed at you and giggled as you struggled to get in a position to write. A younger teenager got a textbook and put it on the seat of your desk, ending the laughter.

You felt better knowing that at least some of the kids were like him (at least you think it was a boy). "Alright, here are the rules: No talking. No cheating. If you come across a question you don't understand, skip it. Do NOT try to guess it. Once you are finished, hand in your test and leave the room with your parents. You have a calculator to help you with math problems. If I catch you on your phones, you will have to retake the test next week. Any questions? No? Good. Now begin."

You had never taken a test like this before. At first, they were extremely easy, then got only moderately harder. After a while, you seriously had to think about some of these questions. It's a good think you spend a lot of your time on the internet. You managed to be the first one finished, upon which, you handed in your test. Walking past the other kids you quietly chuckled, making them feel bad for laughing at you.

After about an hour, a staff member came back with your results. You were kind of nervous, but you didn't have any reason to be. Opening the envelope, you found that you did...
14.title: Placement test

145.content:
"Tenth grade? But... but that's in High School!" Your mother gasped, picked you up, and hugged you. "Oh Jackie, honey, I'm so proud of you!" Trish couldn't be happier knowing her little boy was a genius. You, on the other hand, just got significantly more terrified. You barely survived a few months of kindergarten, how were you expected to get through a single day of high school? You had to find a way out of this by tomorrow.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----

"...But what if I get lost?"
"You'll have someone showing you to each class."
"What if I get smooshed in gym class?"
"You only have to go to once a week, and the teacher will personally oversee you."
"But what if..."
"Jack, I'm not trying to be mean, but you're going to make mommy late for work."
You used every second since you got back from the placement test to try and weasel your way out of going to school, but unfortunately, it didn't work. Mom gave you a hug. "Don't worry, Jackie, everything will be fine." She then left you in the front and drove off. You nervously walked inside. It was so empty. Class must have started already. You walked into the office, where the school counselor was waiting for you. She was a middle aged woman with an average figure, dressed in the brightest teal suit you had ever seen. She knelt down to you and smiled. "Hi, there. You must be Jackson." She had an obvious southern twang to her voice. "He-he-hello...", you meekly replied. "Your momma told me so much about you over the phone. She explained all about your condition, an' your eatin' habits an' whatnot." Suddenly a girl walked into the office. She had green eyes and blonde hair done up in twin tails with the ends colored purple. She wore a schoolgirl uniform with a white shirt, a teal, black, and purple skirt, and had a Pikachu backpack. "Hi, Miss Denton. I'm not late, am I?"

"Late for being early. This is..." "OMIGOD HE'S SO CUTE!" The girl squealed at she grabbed you and hugged you tight. You tried in vain to fight out, but she only hugged you tighter until she realized her arms were sinking into you. She let go, leaving an indention in your torso. "*Gasp* I'm sosososo sorry. Should we get the nurse? Or call the hospital? Or..." "Kiki, calm down. This is Jack, the boy I told you about yesterday. The one with the condition." Ms. Denton and the girl watched in amazement as the creases in your body slowly filled back up. "Oh wow. So you're like a little cartoon boy, huh?", the girl asked. "W...well..." "THAT'S ADORABLE!" She attempted to hug you again, but the counselor stepped between you. "Keisha, shug, I think you're scarin' the boy." She backed up and blushed a little bit. "Sorry. My name's Keisha Thompson, but you can call me Kiki." She quickly held out her hand and you slowly shook it. "I'm Jack." Ms. Denton stepped in. "Now Jack, hon, Kiki's gonna show 'round the building 'til home room starts. You're gonna have the same classes as her except for electives. So if you want, you can either stay with her, or come back with me and we can go over what classes you'd want to take. Y'all take care, now." Kiki enthusiastically skipped out of the office while you timidly followed her. Was everyone in public school really this wierd?

"You're scared, aren't you?" "No. I'm terrified." "What do you have to be scared of? Your condition makes you pretty much immortal. I'd kill for one DAY of that." Well... yeah, but... when I was in kindergarten, a group of bullies found out about my condition and took advantage of it. I don't think I went one day without getting turned into a pancake." "Hmm. Yeah, I can see what you mean. For a while, I was getting bullied, also." You were surprised to learn this. Who could hate someone so cheerful and energetic? "You see, I'm what you would call an "Otaku". I'm, like, obsessed with Japanese culture. You know, like; anime, video games- especially RPG's, the fashion..." "Like... like Pokemon?" Kiki noticed you staring at her Pikachu backpack. "You play like Pokemon, huh?" "Yeah. I'm playing through Fire Red right now, and my best team has Electrode, Scyther, Raticate..." "You know Raticate's not that popular." "Well he should be. If you teach him Dig and Thunderbolt, then have him learn Hyperfang and Crunch, he'll be a monster. And on top of that, he has really high speed..." Kiki was pleased that she had gotten you talking. You felt a lot more comfortable around her now. "So what kind of movies do you like?" "I really like the Marvel movies, and ones with a bunch of explosions. What about you?" Kiki thought about it for a minute. "Hmmm. I'd have to saw I like the Twilight movies the best right now." "Those books are stupid."

Oh no! You quickly realized you had just made your first mistake and possibly your first enemy! And you were getting along so well with her. You read on the internet how defensive "Twi-hards" could be. Your first day hadn't even started and already you were possibly in danger. how does she react?
145.title: Too smart for your own good

Trish tried to keep her composure. She thought that you were probably upset because she squished you in her sleep again. "Well, we can go once we've cleaned up a little bit. Why don't you start picking up your toys?"
"But I didn't get them out! Andrew did!" You started tugging on her sweatpants. "Come on, mom! They're putting in a new game and I need to get the high score on it!", you whined.
Your mother was really getting annoyed. "Well, if you got him to pick them up after he was done, we would be halfway done right now. and don't you already have the high scores on the other games?"
"No! You don't understand! I neeeeed to have all the high scores on all the games always!", you continued to whine. Your mother clearly didn't understand how important it was to maintain your stats. "Besides, you never clean up your mess, either."

Your mom quickly knelt down and lifted you so you were eye-level with her. "I have had it with your attitude, young man! You are going to do your chores and that's the end of it!" She was clearly upset.
"But moooooom...!"
"Not another word, or you are grounded! Do you understand me?!"

For normal kids, being grounded was an inconvenience at best. Sure, it meant something (tv, video games, computer, ect.) was taken away from them, but nothing really happened. Since you were home schooled, you would just wait for your mom to go to work and squeeze under the your bedroom door to play your games. So your mom came up with a solution for this: She would stuff you inside a putty container and let you out only to do your school work. Was it a bit severe? Maybe. But it got the point across and scared you enough to keep from misbehaving.

"Y...*gulp* yes, ma'am," you replied. The fight had been sucked out of you.
"*sigh* Good. Now, if we hurry up and you do a good enough job, I might... MIGHT... take you and Andrew over to the arcade later." Your mom never wanted you to feel like you got special treatment, but she didn't want to be too hard on you.
"*grumble* Fine."
She tousled your weird, putty hair. "There we go." She then plugged in her headphones. Any time you had to do your chores, you whined about it the entire time and she didn't want to hear it. You stomped out of her room and started shoving toys in your closet. After which, you looked at your list of chores.

PICK UP YOUR TOYS
CLEAN THE WINDOWS
WIPE DOWN COUNTERS
WASH DISHES
WASH/DRY/FOLD CLOTHES

"Uuugggggghhhh! This is gonna take forever!", you groaned. You walk into the kitchen and grab a cloth. This was going to be a while.

=============================================

"Well, it's gonna be a while before the clothes dry, so I may as well take a break." You walked into the living room and sat in the recliner to wait for your mom. "I'm practically done anyway." You decided to play your 3ds while you waited for you mom to finish.


1 hour later...

"Ugh! What is taking mom so long?!", you whined as you tossed your game to your side. You suddenly spotted her walking in, sweating from having scrubbed the kitchen floor and bobbing her head to her music. "Hey mom, I'm done. Can we go now?" She seemed to ignore you, being too engrossed with her tunes to pay you any mind. "Moooooom, hello? Are you listening to me?" She just continued jamming out and neared the recliner. Depending on what she listened to, she would zone out. "HELLOOOOO! EARTH TO-" She quickly turned around and bent over, her (rather large) rear hovering over you. "-mom?", you whimpered just before she sat down.

*SPLAT* Your entire body was instantly squashed flat as a pancake underneath your mother's weight. Your muffled cries went unheard as she ground her butt into you, dancing a little bit with her music, unaware of what she was putting her son through.
151.title: Cleaning House

1511.content:
Your mother started to get comfortable on the chair but something was off. The chair was oddly softer than the large leather chair she was used to. Looking around see saw your 3DS nearby and immediately jump up knowing why the chair was softer, she had sat on her son. To you her getting up was the best thing that has happened all day, even though your own mother has flattened you twice within 24 hours.

'Sorry honey, I didn't see you there.' She said as you reformed to your original shape. 'I guess I was lost in the song.' That was followed by a small nervous chuckle.

'I really hate being smashed. It makes me feel like some kind of putty.' You moped.

'Don't be that way Honey. Listen, once mommy finishes the rest of the house work I will take you to the arcade like you wanted. Okay?' your mom said trying to cheer you up.

Your face instantly lit up 'really?' you asked forgetting any bad feeling you had toward your mother.

'Really. Just give mommy an hour or two just to clean out the attic.'

You couldn't contain your excitement, you felt like you were going to explode. Your mother walked off leaving you in your own little world. Just thinking about the new game made you jump for joy. Andrew said that they were getting a new game in but he wasn't able to tell you much about it. All he said was that it was going to be a blast. With all that anticipation you went to go get on the computer to see if you could find out anything about this new game.

While you were on the computer'
1511.title: Sorry Honey.

15111.content: You walked over and answered the door, but who was on the other side?
15111.title: Ring, Ring,

151111.content:
You didn't have time to react. You were grabbed and put into what was like a strangle hold. Looking up you saw the face of Gina, the girl who went trick or treating that one year. She had long red hair and a slight tan. She was a little more than a foot taller than you and had that death grip on you whole body.

'Hello Jack, you look as cute as ever.' She said while maintaining the bear hug. 'You're just so cute I had to see you again. I didn't even get to ask where you live, at least you said you lived next to Andrew.'

'That's all good but what does that have to do with being here now?'

'Andrew said that you didn't have any friends so I wanted to cheer you up and be your friend.'

You didn't know what to say. Your mother had shelter you most of your life and people were something you didn't understand. Even if she was nice you know that people could be mean. With the only people you every really see being your mother, Andrew and Steven you really don't know how to act all you could do was stammer.

'Oh that is so cute!! So can you come over I only live two block away and my mom said that you could?' she said as she released you for the hug.

'I will have to ask my mom but she is kind of protective of me. So I don't know if she will let me go.' After being released you final began to regain you shape

'Well let's ask her.' She then grabbed your hand and drug you through the house till you find her. You were unable to do anything but try to keep up so you didn't fall. Eventually you found the ladder to the attic where your mother was cleaning.

'Um' mom?' you shouted up the ladder.
'
Yes?' you heard return from the attic.

'Um' Gina wants to know if I could go to her house' so, can I go over?' you said timidly not wanting to make her mad.

There was a dead silence for a while. Finally, after a few seconds you go a replay of 'Who is Gina?'

'She was someone who went trick or treating with me.'

It took even longer to get a response this time. After around 45 seconds you she said'
151111.title: Gina the girl

choices: She wants to watch a movie with you.
She stuffs you into a bottle with a label on it. (You've been decieved!)
1511111.content:
Trish had to think about it for a while, and with good reason. The last time you were with other kids, you had gotten eaten by one of them (though you told her it was an opossum). The idea of going to another kid's house where she couldn't see what was happening to you didn't sit right with her. Still, she knew how shy and awkward you were around other people, and that it was mostly her fault for keeping you cooped up at home. "Alright, hon. Be careful."
"Okay mom." Upon hearing this, Gina once again put you in her death grip hug and squealed. "Thank you, Miss Harper. I promise I'll take extra good care of him!" With that, she ran out the door, still hugging you tightly. You still weren't sure what to make of all this.

As she ran out of the house with you in her arms, your mother couldn't help but chuckle. "*sigh* My baby's growing up...", she said, continuing to dust the junk she had accumulated over the years. A few minutes later, Andrew walked in and noticed the ladder down. The boy climbed up to see who was up there.

"Hi Miss Harper. Where's Jack?", he asked. "I don't see him in his room and the computer's on."

"Hey there, Andrew. Your friend Gina came by earlier and he went over to her house. You just missed them."

"Really? Huh. That's weird", Andrew said.

"I know, but I think it'll do him some good to be around new people."

"No, not him going over to her house."

"Oh? Then what is it?", Trish asked curiously.

"It's weird because she's supposed to be moving."

"WHAT?!"

=============================================================

Andrew had often talked about his friends when he came over for dinner and had always said nice things about Gina; her love of cute things and fantasy (you learned that she was the one who got everyone to dress up like Adventure Time characters) and her apparent crush on Andrew... or his crush on her. The way he talked about her, it often seemed like the latter. From what you heard, she also had an overactive imagination, often mentioning an imaginary friend who was kinda like you. She talked about her the entire time you guys were trick or treating, but you were too busy trying to avoid Stevie to pay attention much.

As she ran down the street, she continued carrying you, hugging you tight like a stuffed animal. "G-gina? You mind letting me down so I can walk?", you asked her.

"No way, Jay-Jay. Last time I took my eyes off of you, Andrew's cousin gobbled you up", Gina said, hugging you little bit tighter.

"Wh-what are you... Who told you about that?"

"You did, just now", she answered, sticking her tongue out and winking. She was smart, you had to give her that. "So how come you haven't told anyone? Did you like it or something?"

You started blushing as she questioned you. You still weren't quite sure why you didn't rat him out the first chance you got. It had been almost a year and you still haven't told anyone. "Well... I don't know. I mean, he was really nice to me after he... well..."

Gina giggled a little. "Ew, that's so gross. Man, is there anyone in Andrew's family who hasn't eaten you? I guess you must be pretty tasty, huh?"
You started shaking a little bit. There wasn't anything about what she had just said that didn't make you think she had an entirely different reason to take you with her.
"Oh, jeez. That didn't come out right at all. You must think I want to nom on you, too", the girl said, blushing a little bit. "Well, don't worry. I promised your mom that I'd take care of you, and when I make a promise, I keep it."

You were a bit relieved from hearing this, though the thought didn't leave your mind.
"Besides, I'd never gobble up anything as cute as you", she said, nuzzling you you a bit as she neared her street.

You blushed hard as she cuddled you. "Um, s-so how come you came over just now? I mean, it's kinda out of the blue."

Her smile started to fade a bit. "I guess you got me. The truth is, I might be moving soon if my big sister gets this job. I never got to play with you before, and I'd hate to leave and regret not getting to know you."

Now you felt bad for questioning her intentions. "Aw. I'm sorry to hear that. Well, if you're moving soon, I guess we shouldn't waste any ti-"

You were cut off by Gina practically squeezing the life out of you. "Great! Thanks, Jay-Jay!" With that, she ran home and rushed inside. As she walked into her room, you were instantly made aware of just how much she loved fantasy. There were plush toys of various video game monsters and dragons scattered about her floor and her room was princess-themed. In the corner, you noticed a mannequin where she seemed to be working on another cosplay dress.

After closing the door, she finally puts you down, allowing you to reform a little bit. "W-well, now that we're here, what do you want to do first?", you ask her.

She bites her finger and thinks about it for a minute. "Welllll....."
1511111.title: Jack's New Friend

15111111.title: End of the Line

choices: Trish believes her, rushes off to find you in a panic, Gina gets away.
15111112.content:
"I think we should play dress up and act out an adventure. ive got loads of costumes made. you could be a knight!" Gina said with a smile pointing to a big chest "just take your clothes off and pick an outfit" She said with a sweet smile. You blushed "..t...take my clothes off?" she giggled "dont worry i wont look, im going to pick an outfit too!" she said with a smile and rushed to the chest opening it. it was filled with piles of fabric that was obviously costumes, props and some cool looking armour that looked metal. seeing that you couldnt help but grin a little and you pulled your tshirt off over your head, her back was to you as she rummaged around in the chest.

just as you got down to your underwear you heard her giggle and turn quickly "found it!" she declared, holding up a translucent pink bottle with a flip cap as if it were a precious item. she grinned seeing you in your underwear "hehe perfect timing" she said her grin getting wider. you were suddenly less sure she was going to let you be a knight "wh..what do you meaaah" you cried out as she turned the bottle upside down and slammed it on your head hard, your squishy body quickly compacting and being forced into this small bottle. you tried to struggle but Gina had no problem holding you still as she pushed you into it more, eventually turning the bottle the right way up and pushing the remainder of you in with her fingers "hehe, squishy" she said to herself as she finally got all of you in. quickly capping the bottle tight she grinned in at you, all she saw was a pink mass through the tinted glass. without your clothes you were pretty much one colour compacted so tightly.

you tried to move or squirm but you were crushed so tightly that you couldn't nudge the bottle at all. she placed on on her desk and wrote something on a sticky note before smoothing it onto the bottle "there, now i know which one is you" she said with a giggle. "see, we are moving today. i wanted to make sure i got a chance to play with you. she grabbed your bottle and gently placed it back in the chest on a pile of satin, from one of her princess costumes, then covered you up with an alice in wonderland dress folded so you were hidden from the world. when she closed the lid of the chest and locked it, the fabrics were pushed down, packed tight in the chest to ensure you wouldnt slide about when moved. Gina got to work packing her room as quickly as she could, glancing back at the costume chest constantly with a big grin. now she had a new toy that she could play all sort of games with.

Her mom had told her to throw any clothes she didnt want anymore into a big bag for her to drop off at the goodwill store on their way out of town, she threw your clothes in with some old tomboy outfits that didn't fit her anymore. within the hour her room was all boxed up and being carried out to the truck. the chest with its hidden captive, you, was placed under alot of boxes and hidden from sight. Gina grinned looking forward to unpacking her things at the new house, she was just about to climb into her moms car to follow the truck when your Mom drove up, Gina's grin quickly fell, nervous. she had hoped to be on their way to the new house before your mom noticed anything.

you couldn't hear a thing, you had felt movement a little while earlier but in your glass bottle packed tightly between masses of fabrics that made up dresses, all sound was muffled to complete silence. you paniced, how would your mom find you, if Gina was moving, your Mom wouldn't know until you didnt come home later. by then you could be who knows where, trapped in a little glass bottle in a girls bedroom.

Trish wanted to know where you were, Gina's mother didn't know, they turned to Gina who had time to think up a quick story "Oh Jack? we played for a little bit, then when i realised how behind i was on my packing he helped me do it. he left about ten minutes ago" she said pointing down the street "he's ok walking home himself right?" she said with fake worry on her face...
15111112.title: She stuffs you into a bottle with a label on it...

151111121.content:
Trish's eyes went wide as she heard that "no he certainly isn't. Anything could happen to him!" She quickly got back in her car and headed off down back towards home in the hopes of spotting you walking. It was all Gina could do to stop herself from grinning. Hopping into the truck with her mom she looked worried and said innocently "I hope little jack is alright"

Meanwhile in the costume trunk you felt the vibrations of the engine as they drove to the new house. This was terrible, you were hidden away, packed inside a bottle so tight you couldn't move and surrounded by girly dresses. Worst of all your mom might not be able to find you.

You lost track of time as you were moved with the rest of the boxes, but eventually the truck stopped and you heard the faint muffled sound of voices and boxes being moved. You had a moment of weightlessness as the trunk was lifted up and carried into the house. But after all that Gina didn't even open her costume trunk, occupying herself with unpacking the rest of her room.

You spent the weekend listening to the muffled sounds of her radio and her hanging out in her new room before finally the sound of the trunk being unlocked got your attention. The dress above you was removed and Ginas grinning face peered down at your bottle prison. "Hey little guy, sorry I kinda forgot about you hehe. My bad" she reached in grasping your bottle and popped the lid.

After a few minutes of shaking you frantically like a ketchup bottle you popped free as a skintone glob on the floor making her snort with laughter. She put your bottle aside before grabbing you and rolling you into a little ball. She held you in one hand showing off her room, all her costumes and fantasy pictures, her bed and her closet. She giggled as you quivered in her hand trying to reform but it was taking a while and only amused her.

"Oh I've got to show you the best part" *she said skipping over to her bedroom door. You saw a little touchpad next to the handle and she pressed her thumb to it. There was a click and the door opened a crack. She pushed it shut again and you heard the sound of it locking back in place. "Mom made us all get our thumbprints scanned for all the security doors. I can't get into the basement, but it's cool because it means you can't get out my room without me. Hehe. Ooh and all the rooms are soundproof. So I can be as loud as I want without mom moaning." She grinned at you. There was no way to escape and she wanted you to know it.

Playfully she put your ball shape inside one of her princess dresses and left you to reform. An hour later when you finally did, she snorted with more laughter as you had re shaped into the dress. Blushing you went to pull it off then remembered you had no clothes. "Give me something to wear" she giggled at that "I did, your wearing it!" You frowned "this is girly give me something else" sadly the closest she got was leggings and a tshirt. You felt so embarrised but you couldn't do anything about it, it was this or a dress.

Gina walked around you while thinking "right jay jay. You know your here to play with me. You will sleep in your bottle every night and play all the games with me. If you don't I'll just stuff you in the bottle and glue it shut and bury it in the flower bed!" She said with a giggle, you wernt sure if she meant that but it might be best not to test that.

She grinned, "right now let's...
151111121.title: Trish believes her, rushes off to find you in a...

151112.content:
Almost as soon as you opened the door, a pair of boots stomped on top of you, reducing you to a splatter. "Haha! 'Sup, snot rocket", you heard a painfully familiar voice laugh. You knew that snicker and the bottom of those boots anywhere. It was your cousin, Kat. You hoped that living on the other side of town meant that you wouldn't have to see her that often, but you were sorely mistaken. She felt obligated to toughen up her wimpy little cousin, which meant anything from getting stomped into a puddle, to using you as bubblegum. You, on the other hand, only saw it as her being a big bully, and she had a knack for convincing your mom and aunt that it was your fault, so you couldn't even go to them for help.


"*groan* Hi Kat...", you said, your words muffled underneath your teenage cousin. Katrina snickered as she scraped you off of the bottom of her boots, your gooey body sticking to her soles like gum. She was wearing a Black Sirens T-shirt that was a couple sizes too big for her (likely having been handed down from your mother), her heavy black boots, and a pair of green cargo pants (which she seemed to be starting to grow out of). Kat kicked your reforming body over to beside the couch where she plopped down and turned on the TV to watch some wrestling. For reasons you couldn't understand, she was obsessed with wrestling, specifically an older team of female wrestlers called the Black Sirens. You didn't know anything about them other than your mom had a picture of them and a cute little girl (probably a fan) framed on her wall and a couple of action figures of them in a small display case in the living room. You never really bothered to ask why, since you didn't really play with toys of girls unless they turned into motorcycles or cars or something. "What are you doing here?", you asked your cousin after fully reforming.



"Hmm? Oh yeah, I guess Auntie didn't tell you yet, huh?", Kat said.

"Tell me what?", you asked.

"Eh, if she hasn't told you, then don't worry about it", Kat said as she leaned back, kicking her boots off. You looked over at the door. She had brought in a couple of large bags with her, which you didn't seem to notice, since she had splattered you on the ground.

"Uh, why're you here, Kat?", you asked, not really liking where this was going.

"I told you not to worry about it, you little nerd! Now go put my boots up", Kat replied.

You ran over to the attic, where your mom had just finished cleaning to try to figure out just why your cousin was visiting. "Mooomm!", you yelled as you ran over to her. "What's Kat, doing here?", you asked her.

"What?! She wasn't supposed to be here until next week", Trish said, a bit of shock in her voice.

"Moooommmm...", you whined grabbing her pant leg. "I wanna know why she's here", you said, rocking back and forth.

Your mom knelt down and looked held her hand on your shoulder. "Jack, sweetie... Your cousin is going to be living with us for... a while. A few years at least", she said.

"W-what? Momma, why didn't you tell me? How come she's living with us?", you asked, the whiny tone still in your voice. You did not like the idea of sharing a house with your cousin. Not one bit.

"Honey, your cousin can't get a good education out where your aunt and uncle live, and..."

"She got expelled, didn't she?", you asked.

"*sigh* Yes, Katrina got expelled", your mom answered. "So I volunteered to take her in. I figured some time away from that farm would do some good."

"But where's she gonna sleep?"

"Well, you and her can share a room", she answered. "You're always complaining about mommy squishing you, so consider this your first step to having your own bed."

"But she's a girl!", you yelled. "I can't share my room with her!"


"Hey, I can hear you two talking about me, ya know!", Kat said from the living room.

"Mooooommmmm!", you whined.

"Jack, you are really getting on mommy's nerves", Trish said as she picked you up. "I know it's going to take some getting used to, but I promise you we can make this work", your mother said. You simply crossed your arms and pouted. "Look, I'm done cleaning the attic, so why don't we head to the arcade?"

You very quickly stopped being angry and your face lit up in excitement as you jumped out of your mother's arms and ran into your room to get dressed. You didn't care if Kat was going to mess with you later, you were going to play arcade games and win toys and prizes. There's no way you could be upset at that.

===============================

You were very quickly made upset that Andrew was bringing his cousin, Ash, along with him. "Hey, Jack", Andrew said. "You ready to play Pokken Tournament? I heard the arcade's owner got it for really cheap since it isn't really popular in Japan. Are we lucky or what?", your friend said as Ash listened to some music up in front.

"How come he's coming?", you asked Andrew.

"Well, you brought your cousin, so I figured it'd be fair if I brought mine. I know he was kind of a jerk to you on Halloween, leaving you in that house and everything, but he's really cool when he isn't hungry", the boy said.

You cringed at the word, "hungry". You experienced his appetite firsthand, and it wasn't something you wanted to relive anytime soon. Sure, he cleaned you up and got you back home, but you didn't want to risk another trip through his digestive system. You wanted to avoid him as much as possible.

"Hey, gumwad", Kat whispered to you. "Who's that cute guy sitting with Auntie?"

"That's my cousin", Andrew blurted out. "Why, do you like him or som-mmf." Andrew was quickly cut off by Kat's hand.

"Shut up!", Kat whispered, blushing heavily. "No I do not like him!"

"Huh? You guys say something?", Ash asked, looking back.

"N-nope! Just messing around!", Kat said as she took her hand off of Andrew's mouth.

"Hey, Jack, your cousin's funny", he chuckled as your mom drove up to the arcade.

Once there, it became clear to her that she didn't bring enough money to get the five of you in, at least not without someone sacrificing their tokens. Someone was going to have to sneak you in.

Who will it be?
151112.title: Kat ruins everything.

1511121.title: End of the Line

1511122.content:
Your mother keep counting the money over trying to make sure that her math was not off but each time it came up short. Turning around she looked at you and said “Honey, mommy forget to bring some more money for all of you to get in, so we need to sneak you in.” Your hopes sank a little, this was meant to be just you then Kat showed up and Andrew along with Ash came along. Every little bit of joy of today keep getting pushed out by all this bad but you didn’t want to sacrifice any chances to play Pokken Tournament. You figured that you would suck it up just so you could get in there and play.

"I got it Auntie Trish." Kat spoke up and your heart skipped a beat. You really didn't want Kat to sneak you in. She would do something to torture you for sure. You wanted to speak up but Kat covered you mouth and said, "You ready cuz?" You shook your head but that didn't seem to faze Kat who proceed to crush you into a ball about the size of a gumball. Kat then tossed you into her mouth. Moving you onto one of her molars she began to chew you like actual gum. Her warm breath washed over you as you were drenched in her saliva.

Back outside everyone got out of the car and made their way to the arcade. Trish payed for everyone to get in along with getting four rolls of tokens. She handed Andrew and Ash both a roll right before they both ran off to play the games. Trish turned to Kat and said "Okay Kat, I will need your help keeping an eye on Jake."

"Don't worry Auntie, I'll make sure Jake stays close." Kat said.

"Great, I'm going over to our booth so we can all meet over there after a while.” Trish said before walking away leaving you with Kat.

Kat walked over toward the main game area as she continued to chew on you. “You seem a little softer than the last time I was over Gumwad.” She said, “I think I may keep you in there for a while to fix that.” This was bad, you couldn’t do anything about it in your current situation and no one was going to get you out of it. “Hey, at least you’ll be close like Auntie asked.” That did little to make you feel better. You couldn’t play the game while in her mouth. “And don’t worry, I’ll save you some tokens.” She said sitting at one of the arcade cabinets.

You wanted out immediately, not only to keep Kat from using your tokens but also to get away from her. All you could do was sit and stew in your anger as Kat continued to chomp away on you. Little glimpses of the outside world broke through as Kat chewed with her mouth open letting you see the games she played. You thought about what the next few years of Kat saying at your house and ‘helping’ you get stronger would be like and didn’t like it one bit. In the past she seemed to mean well but it was mostly torture to you.

This went on for the better part of an hour before Kat went off to the bathroom. Walking into one of the stalls she sat down on the toilet and said “Okay I think that is enough for now.” She then spat you into hand and began to dry you off with some toilet paper. After you were fairly dry she set you on the back of the toilet. The abuse you had taken made it harder for you to reform but after about 5 minutes you finally regained your shape.

“Bet you feel a lot tougher, don’t you?” Kat said giving you a noogie.

Still angry about her using you as gum for close to an hour you wanted to snap at her but you also wanted to ignore it and go play some games. What do you do?
1511122.title: Kat sneaks you in.

choices: she hangs you up to dry with the rest of the clothes, you slowly reform
she hangs you up to dry with the rest of the clothes, your fused with the bra
1512.content:
