152.content:
As your mother told you this, you had mixed feelings. Kat was your older cousin, though she acted more like your big sister. She was a tomboyish girl who lived in a rural area outside of town. She had the same hair color as your mom, and was rather fit, though she had a bit of a bubble butt, something that seemed to run in the family. Normally the two of you got along pretty well. When you were little, she let you play with the animals that your aunt and uncle had at their house and made sure nothing bad happened to you. She also helped you catch your first pet, a lizard named Vinny. Of course, you knew nothing about lizards, which made you very upset when you found nothing in it's enclosure but a tail after it ran away. Lately, though, she's been pretty rough with you, pressuring you into doing things that normally scared you. She had once dared you to take a piece of rawhide from her dog, with you ending up in the dog's belly and having to explain to your mother why you smelled so bad after she picked you up. Because your luck is terrible, you were told that you didn't have to listen to her if you didn't want to, and made to apologize for trying to get your cousin in trouble. It had been a while since you had seen her last, and you weren't sure if she was still like that.

"Um, why are we bringing her over here?", you asked. "Don't I usually spend the week over at her house?"

"Me and Miss Barbara are going to be gone for a couple of weeks. Me and your aunt and uncle worked it out so Katrina can stay here, instead. I know how much you get upset when you're separated from your games", she said. You hated to admit it, but this was very much true. You rarely ever left the house without at least five DS games, even if it was just on trips to the store. You had also just gotten a new game, which meant that you HAD to stay and play it.

"Y-yeah, I guess you're right. Who's gonna be watching Andrew and Stevie, though?", you asked.

"Miss Barbara got her nephew, Ash to watch them while we're gone. You remember him, right? He just got his driver's licence, so he's going to be picking up anything you might need to eat." You REALLY weren't sure about this. The last time you met Ash, he picked on you until deciding to make you into a snack. Of course, he was nice to you after you were... released. He even cleaned you up and walked you home. You still weren't sure what to make of him, though.

"O-oh. Where are you going, anyway? And how come Miss Barbara's going with you?"

Upon hearing your question, your mother blushed a little bit. "Er, nothing you need to worry about. Just get dressed so we can pick your cousin up", she said, scooting you out the door so she could pack.

===============

You took your 3DS on the long car ride over to your aunt and uncle's house, only putting it down to say hi to them before Kat left with you and your mother. She seemed to be in a hurry, wherever she was going. You were about halfway home before she stopped at a gas station to use the restroom, leaving you alone with your cousin.

As you were playing Smash Bros, your game was suddenly snatched right out of your hands. "H-hey!"

"Geez, cuz, you've had your eyes glued to this thing for the whole ride. Why not give it a break and enjoy the scenery for a little bit?", Katrina asked.

" 'Cus we're back in town now, there's nothing to see", you said, reaching for your game, which she held just out of your reach. "Now give it back!"

"See? You missed out on an opportunity to enjoy your surroundings for some dumb game."

"I want it back!"

Katrina looked over at you and smirked. "Alright. Arm wrestle you for it. If I win, you gotta let me play it for the rest of the trip."

You knew you couldn't win. You simply crossed your arms and pouted. "*hmph* You can play it...", you grumbled, slumping back in your seat.

"Thanks cuz", she said, reaching back and rustling your hair before playing your game.


Not long after, your mother returned, quickly prompting you to rat out your cousin. "Mom! Kat took my game while you were gone!", you whined, almost the second she opened the door.

"He said I could play it, Aunt Trish", Katrina said, her eyes glued to the 3DS screen.

"Is she telling the truth Jack?", Trish asked as she buckled in.

"W-well, yeah, but..."

"Jack, you know how I feel about lying. Now apologize to your cousin."

"B-but she-"

"I don't want to have to ground you for the entire time I'm gone, young man", your mother said sternly, Kat barely keeping herself from laughing. She often did this. Trick people into getting into trouble. Sure, you thought it was funny when she did it to your other cousins, but you didn't find it so humorous right now.

You sat back and groaned. "Sorry, Kat..."

Your cousin simply nodded as your mother started the car up again. "That's better", she said as she got back on the road. "I hope this isn't how you're going to act while I'm gone."

"N-no, ma'am..."

"Eh, don't worry, Aunt Trish. If he throws a fit, I'll just stick him in his little time out ball", Katrina said.

"*sigh* I'm sure he'll be fine, Kat. We skipped lunch today, and I'm sure he's just grouchy because he's hungry", your mother said.

========================

After you returned home, your mother went over a few things with your cousin. One thing that made you particularly uncomfortable, was her bringing up having to share a bed with you, due to her fear of you getting eaten by another furry intruder. She then took her luggage and gave you a kiss goodbye before grabbing her luggage and heading outside, where Ash was waiting with Andrew and Stevie to drop her and Barbara off at the airport. You wished you could go with them, or at least figure out where they were going. Your mind was on one thing at the moment, though. After waving them goodbye, you walked into your mother's room, where your cousin had made herself at home and was still playing your game while laying in your mom's bed. "Alright, we're home now, so it's time to give it back", you demanded, holding out your hand.

"Give what back?", Kat asked. "You're gonna have to be specific or I'm not gonna have a clue what you're talking about, dude", she said as she continued playing your game.

"You know what I mean! I want my game back!", you said, stomping on the ground.

"Woah, chill out, Jack. I'm just messing with you", she said as she hopped off and handed you your game.

"Well, knock it off, okay?", you said as you tugged on the system... though she didn't seem to be letting go. "I said stop messing with me!" You whined as you tried in vain to pull it out of her grip.

"You know, you're being really whiny, Jack. I think you should hold off on playing it for a little bit", she said as she plucked the game out of your hand. "I think we should..."

[author's note: Looking back, I didn't really like how the first version of this chapter looked, so I'm redoing it. I'll delete this note in about a week]

A mischievous smirk formed on her face as she thought. Her little cousin had always been fun to mess with, and she now discovered that he tasted delicious. She was going to have a lot of fun with this. "Why don't you come get 'em?", Kat said as she opened her mouth wide and pointed into her maw.

"Wh-what?! No way! Quit being a butt and give me my arms back!", you yelled as you stomped on the floor.

The older girl laughed at how ridiculous her cousin looked. "Sorry, little guy, but I'm not gonna make myself puke. You have any idea how gross that is?"

You were pretty upset at her at this point. "Fine! I'll just hide in my room til they grow back!", you screamed at Kat. "And once they do, I'm telling mom on you!"

Kat was briefly worried as her cousin ran to the door, but she quickly jumped over you and slammed the door shut. "Nope. Not happening, Jack", Kat said, smirking as you ran into the door.

You managed to peel your face off from the bedroom door, your cousin laughing at the flattened shape of your head. "Th-that's not fair! You know I can't regenerate body parts if I'm too close to them!", you yelled.

"Oh, that's right. Guess you'll have to jump in and get them before they digest", Kat said, letting out a strawberry scented belch in your face. "Doesn't look like they've got very long, either."



"Wh-why do you wanna eat me so bad?", you asked as you tried to squeeze your feet underneath the crack of the door. You didn't like being eaten. You had seen the inside of several bellies in your short life; some of them belonging to people, some animals, and a couple of occasions saw you going through even your own mother's digestive system. You hated every bit of it, and you were very vocal on that. "I just want my arms back, please!"

"Hmm. Alright, Jacky. But first..."

"I'm not gonna wrestle you for them!", you yelled. Every time you were with your cousin, she had always found some excuse to try and wrestle you, even when she was little, your aunt would have to scrape you off of the floor or separate you from her shirt or shorts.

"I wasn't gonna say that", Kat said, throwing her arms up in faux shock. "But if you insist..."

Your cousin quickly grabbed under your arm stumps and flung you into the air. You screamed and kicked your legs around as you fell before she hit you in the face with her elbow, making you flip over a couple of times before you landed on your back.

Kat laughed as she stood over you. "Man, you're such a wimp, 'cus", she chuckled as you struggled to lift yourself off the floor. "I'll make a deal with you. You tell me the wrestling move I'm using, I'll give you a chance to take me down. If you get it wrong, I get to keep wailing on ya. Now what'd I just hit you with?"

You were completely terrified. Kat had just entered full evil babysitter mode, a side of her that you rarely ever saw and there wasn't going to be anyone around to stop her for several weeks. "Uh, um... a... uppercut?", you said, hoping you were right.

"AAA! Wrong answer!", she said as she picked you up by your legs and dangled you upside down. "That was a European Uppercut, stubby."

"B-but I was half right!", you said as she brought you over to the shower and tied your legs in a knot around the shower rod.

"Nope! Totally different move. See, with a European Uppercut, you use your elbow..." With that she brought her elbow back and slammed it into your gut, taking the wind completely out of you. "...and with a regular uppercut, you use your fist!" You barely had time to react before she slammed her knuckles into your face, leaving you with a deep crater where your mouth should be and sending you swinging back and forth. Even though it brought you a bit of discomfort and made you dizzy, getting hit didn't really hurt you, and Kat knew this. Unfortunately, she often used this as an excuse to turn you into her personal punching bag. "You think you got it, Jack?", Kat laughed as you slowly swung back to your position. You tried to answer, but because of the knuckle sandwich you just ate, your mouth was too squished up to let out anything but muffled whines. "Hmm, doesn't sound like it. I'll just have to make sure I drive the point home."

You weren't sure what she meant at first, but as soon as she clenched her fists, you knew what was coming. Kat reached back and followed through with a haymaker that knocked you silly. Your world began spinning as you were repeatedly from the impact before she followed through with another punch, then another. The preteen girl then unleashed a barrage of high speed punches, laughing as she beat her helpless little cousin like a drum. Finally, after countless blows, Kat had grown tired of beating you up and sat on the side of the bath tub. "Whew! I think I hammered it in, eh, little guy?", she said as she untied your legs, letting you fall down on the ground with a *splat!* Due to the amount of punishment your cousin inflicted, you looked more like a pile of mush by now than a boy. Kat scraped you off of the tile floor and gathered you into a fleshy ball before kicking you back into the bedroom.

"Giving ya one last chance, 'cus", she said as you regained a bit of your shape. Your face had reformed just in time to scream in terror as Kat grabbed you and tossed you into the air a bit before she spun around and jumped back and rammed her bubble butt into your newly reformed face before slamming down on you, reducing you to a gooey splatter underneath her ass. "Now what was that move called?", Kat laughed as she clenched her cheeks on her little cousin. Of course, you couldn't answer in your position, only letting out muffled screams. "Not playing along, huh? Guess I'll start the three count, then", she said. "One! *slap* Two! *slap*" With each count, she gave her booty a slap, sending shock waves through her cheeks and causing you further discomfort. "*slap* Three! Ding, ding, ding! Here is your winner and STILL undefeated champion, Wild Kat Harper!", she cried as she sat on top of you in triumph. After making fake cheering sounds and pretend announcing (she always took her play wrestling a little too far), she finally stood up, with you still plastered to her rear. "Welp! Looks like ya lost, Jack, and it looks like your arms are already digested", she said as she released a fart on you, the stench being that of rotten strawberries. Your consciousness was contained in a gelatinous core that was stored in your head. If any part of your body was separated, it would lose the ability to reform and would start to break down. Your severed arms were now a part of your cousin, helping fuel her still-developing figure.

"Buuuttt... I never got to pick a prize if I won", Kat said as she peeled your body off of her butt. She held your butt-print body up as an almost evil grin formed on her face.

You still have a chance of escaping unnoticed, although you situation was bad you knew it would only get worse if Sid was aware that you had been unwillingly sniffing his farts. As you sit contemplating your predicament a small gurgle is heard, *PPOOOFF* a silent puff of toxic gas is blown into your face. A fresh scent of rotten eggs and ass makes your eyes water. You try to hold your breath, you don't want to breathe anymore because with every inhalation you are forced to endure the sickening aroma. You start to cry again 'It's hopeless! I'm never going to get away from these revolting farts'. You try to move, anything to escape the forever lingering smell of Sid's backside, but no matter how much you try to move you are completely pinned down by the enormous weight of Sid. After what seems like an eternity Sid finally starts to stand up and it seems you have remained stuck to the warm sweaty seat.

You are both terrified and relieved at the same time, if Sid sees you it will be the start of a new terrible life that no one should live, on the other hand you are just so happy that the stale nauseating gas has been released from your nostrils. As Sid stands he stretches and takes a deep breath in.

'Eurgh God, was that me?!' Sid scrunches up his face as he finally gets a wiff of his old fart, however a smile then appears on his face 'huh huh that's so nasty, but there way more where that came from!' He is about to turn to you when...

'Sid! Dinner!, Your brother and sister are staying around friends for the weekend,so it looks like it's just me and you tonight'

Sid head swings round to his door 'Sweet more Burritos for me', the chubby bully then quickly hurries out of his room leaving you alone. This is your chance, Sid will most certainly notice you if you are still on the chair when he comes back. You need to reform and get moving, you start to concentrate it is much easier now without constant foul smell hanging over you.

After 10 minutes you can feel yourself start to re-shape, you don't know how long it will actually take, after all you had been reduced to a sweaty puddle of goop thanks to Sid's gigantic ass. As you reform you get a better look at your surroundings. Sid's room is filthy, dirty socks and underwear litter the floor, cans of soda and candy wrappers cover his desk and computer. You feel that even if you do reform you could still get lost in his mess. You then look at the walls, it is covered in posters of wrestlers of all kind, tall muscular American wrestlers, short masked Mexican wrestlers, fat hairy Turkish wrestlers and huge obese sumo wrestlers. It seems Sid has an obsession and you didn't want to stick around and get involved with it. Your head is now back to normal and the rest of your body is very close, soon you will be able to move. However it is as you start to become relaxed you then hear something that sends a chill through your body.
'I'm gonna eat the last burrito upstairs ok Mom?

'Fine, just bring down the plate this time'

You then hear slow heavy footsteps coming your way.
153111122.title: Sits at his computer, keeping you trapped under...

1531111221.title: End of the Line

1531111222.content:
You try to move with all your might but all you can do is move your head, you become frantic as your hear the footsteps reach the top of the stairs. But it is hopeless, you are out of time as Sid appears in the doorway looking very bloated from the vast amount of burritos and nachos he had just consumed. You both make eye contact and your eyes widen as a devious grin spreads across his face.

'Why, if it isn't Splatters' Sid says as he walks towards you and begins to circle the chair you are on. 'How in the world did you end up here?'

You don't know whether to speak, you can feel that your body is nearly back to normal if your lucky you can make a break for it, you have to stall him. 'errr I... I... got stuck to you when we were at the park' A noticeable whimper is heard in your voice.

'I thought you got away rather quickly for someone as small and wimpy as you, but I didn't see you. So where were you stuck to?' The grin on Sid's face only grows as he knows the answer but just wants to hear you say it.

'I was stuck to your... butt' Sid starts to roar with laughter at your pathetic situation, your body is basically back to normal now, you just have to wait for the right moment to run for the door.

'Just like ole times. You know, if you missed my smelly butt so much you should of just said. I have missed my favourite toy.'

That was it. You couldn't stay and be treated like his own personal toy, you couldn't go back to the days where you tormented and bullied by him. You try to make a break for it, you jump from the chair and head to the door. But it seems Sid had anticipated this as he quickly lunges and slams the door with all his might and with a large crash you hand gets stuck and you are trapped inside the room with Sid.

You try to pull your mashed hand from the door but it's wedged in, a shadow then appears over you and with a look of immense fear you turn and stare at Sid. 'Leaving so soon Jack? I thought you could stay and play for a little while, wouldn't that be fun?' Sid says as he towers over your small frame.

'Please Sid let me go, I don't want to play. Please Sid my Mom will be worried about where I am.' You plead at the imposing bully but his smile only grows as he listens to you beg.

'oh don't worry Jack i'll look after you, we are going to have lots of fun. I know let's play some of those games that we use to play when you were at school, weren't they fun'.

'Please NO. I don't want to play, Please Sid.' You start to cry as terrible memories of horrid disgusting games that Sid created come flooding back to you.

Sid then turned around showing you an all too familiar fat ass. 'Let's start with Strongman' Sid then started to lower his fat butt on top on you.

'Please Sid, No! Not that one!' you try to move but your hand is stuck. You try to use your free hand and head to push back the heavy arse that was being pushed on top of. Your weak legs wobble under the strain of the fat bully on top of you as he continues to put more weight on top of you. You weak body can't hold out any more and with a loud *SPLAT* the fat bully plummets to the floor crushing under his huge butt. 'Oh dear Jack, seems you lost and you know what the loser gets?' You continue to sob as you hear Sid torment you, you knew what the loser got, you got everyday at school. *PPPPPPPPPPPPHHHHRRRRRRRRRRTTPPP* A hot wet fart is blasted onto your pathetic flattened body, you cry out in disgust as it seems the burritos Sid had ingested had passed right through him. Sid then wiggles his butt on you face enjoying the control he now has over you.

After waiting a few minutes for his fart to sink in, he gets off of you. He stares at you frightened sobbing face and smiles at the ass print that has been left on it. 'Please Sid, I want to go home waaaa' You cry hoping he would have mercy on you.

'Go Home?' Sid says as he releases your hand from the door and picks you up. He then folds your body behind your flattened face making a sort of pile with your face at on the top 'But Jack, play time is only just beginning'. He then drops you and within seconds his ginormous butt comes down on top of you.

Sid can't help but laugh at the familar *splat* sound that is made and the cry of disgust as he unleashes yet another dirty burrito fart onto your poor helpless face. You have no idea what's in store for you as you hear...
1531111222.title: You still can't move, Sid comes in

choices: You've wandered too far. You're lost!
1533.content:
Feeling a bit more confident since you were here last time, you decide to do some exploring. It wasn't everyday that your mom allowed you to be on your own, so you wanted to take advantage of it. You looked over at the playground, but kept walking. Your short time in public school was still burned in your mind. You were even scared of Andrew at first, but you soon felt more comfortable around him and he ended up becoming your best friend. You were still convinced that other kids weren't so nice.

Eventually, you're far enough into the park that most people are far behind you. You feel most comfortable on your own, despite all it's dangers. But since you're far away from anyone that could do anything to you, your mind is at ease. You don't see any animals around either, so that's a huge load off your mind. On top of being squished by people, you've had enough close calls with dogs and cats to scare you out of wanting a pet. Not to mention the raccoon incident.

After about twenty minutes of walking, you notice something about your surroundings.
1533.title: Wandering Aimlessly

15331.content:
As you walked through the park, you notice some soft footsteps coming from behind you. You walk a little faster and turn to the right, hoping whatever it was would leave you alone, but it kept following you. You stopped and look behind you to see what it was, though you immediately wish you hadn't. Standing right there was a dog; a shiba inu. You used to like dogs before you kept finding yourself inside of them. "H-heh... Uh, n-nice doggy...", you said, nervously as you went out to pet the dog.

The dog simply sat and panted as you reached out, making you think that the canine would be nice to you. Of course, you were taken by surprise when the dog suddenly snapped at you and bit your hand. "N-no! Bad dog!", you yelled as you pulled your arm back, ripping your hand off in the process. You knew that your appendage would grow back, so you ran off as the dog licked the excess gooey substance off of it's face. You looked back and panicked as the dog was now chasing after you. It seemed to really like your flavor.

"G-go away! Get out of here, you dumb mutt!", you yelled back. Unfortunately, the dog was faster than you, closing in on it's prey in no time at all. Suddenly, you were hit by an immense pressure as the dog jumped on top of you and was licking your head. "No, doggy, get back! I'm not food!" All of your screams didn't seem to do a bit of good as the dog munched away at your gooey, strawberry dessert-flavored body. You kicked and screamed as the mutt ate you, one bite at a time. Before long, nothing was left of you but a red and black shirt and a small flesh-colored puddle on the ground that the dog was licking up. The rest of you was in it's belly, melting and gurgling away.

You whined as you struggled withing the tight confines of your furry captor. "D-dumb dog... Let me out!", you cried out, which only resulted in a growl from the dog. It didn't seem to like it's meal being so whiny. Out of nowhere, you felt a sudden movement as the dog began running. "H-hey! Quit moving around!", you yelled as the dog ran, it's rapid movement causing the stomach juices to splash over you, increasing your discomfort as you slowly melted into mush.

What happens now?
15331.title: Dog Food

choices: you hear a painfully familiar voice...
15333.content:
It doesn't take long to register in your head to realize that you don't recognize your surroundings at all! You immediately start panicking and start running back the way you came, but there still aren't any landmarks to tell you if you're anywhere close to the park. You can't even see the track that goes around the perimeter! After about ten minutes of running, you give up and start to cry, simply sitting down on the grass and sobbing. You had no idea where you were and there was no telling what could happen to you out here. You saw a few people approach you, but you simply ran away from them. You were already frightened, and your experiences around other people often ended badly, with you ending up as either a smear underneath their feet or a mold of their butt. Being constantly coddled by your mother and being treated as if you were helpless certainly didn't help any. You sat there and cried for quite a while before you heard a clopping noise on the sidewalk beside you.
"Hey, are you okay little boy?", you heard a kind, though somewhat gruff sounding voice ask. You look up to see a policewoman riding a horse, apparently patrolling the area. You wipe the tears out of your eyes and look over at her.

"*sniff*... N-no. I... want walking in the park and I got lost... *sniff*... I want my mom..."
The officer dismounts and rubs your back. "It's alright. I'll help you find her, kid."
"*sniff* Th-thank you, miss..." As you begin to stand, the woman picks you up and sets you on top of the horse before mounting herself behind you.
"Well, that's what I'm here for. Just hold on tight." As she says this, you suddenly feel the horse start to walk rather fast and instinctively grab the front part of it. The woman chuckles as she sees the look of shock on your face. "It's alright, kid. You don't need to be afraid of Charlie here", she said as she patted the horse's side.

After about ten minutes of walking, she stops by the restroom. She dismounts and pulls you down from Charlie's back. "I need to take a break really quick, alright? You stay here and keep each other company." As she walks into the restroom, you're left alone with the horse. You look up at the powerful creature. It's long flowing mane, it's strong legs; so majestic. You start to brush Charlie's coat to keep yourself from being bored. You knew how to handle horses. You went to your aunt and uncle's ranch to help tend to the animals every summer since you were five (though your older cousin always accompanied you).

After about ten minutes...
15333.title: Probably should've stayed with mom...

153331.content:
As you brushed Charlie's coat, you heard some footsteps followed by two painfully familiar voices.

"Hey, Kendra, that little kid looks awfully familiar doesn't he?," a boy said.
"Hmm. Y'know what, Hunter? He kinda does...", another kid says, munching on a bag of candy.

You immediately stop what you're doing and look over at them. You freeze in terror upon looking at them. Both of these kids had made your life a living hell during the short time you were in school. When your mother pulled you out of class, you were hoping that you had seen the last of them, but unfortunately, you were wrong. You try to hide your face from them, hoping they didn't fully recognize you.

"Hey, I know you! You're that gummy kid from kindergarten, aren't you?", Hunter laughed.
"*gulp* I-I-I don't know what you're t-talking about...", you reply meekly.
"Yeah, you are! Man, remember how much fun we used to have with him?", Kedra said.
"Haha, yeah. The desks just aren't as comfy without our favorite seat cushion", Hunter added.

As they walked over to you, you simply stood there, terrified, hoping for the policewoman to be finished soon. You know you couldn't outrun them or try telling them off (you learned very quickly that it only made things worse).
"I-I-I *gulp* I'm not s-s-scared of you anymore...", you lie to them.
"Is that so?" Hunter grabbed your shirt and tossed you to the side. "Then prove it!"
Both kids chuckled as you got up and brushed yourself off, your eyes starting to water. "What are you gonna do, you gooey little midget? You gonna cry to your mommy?", Kendra mocked as she pushed you down once again.

Tears start rolling down your face as you start to pick yourself up. As they saw this, they started laughing. "Hah! You made the little putty boy cry, Kendra! He's an even bigger wuss than I remember!", Hunter scoffed as you sat there, crying your eyes out.
"Heh, looks like being home schooled made him even wimpier. Did your mommy baby you too much, gummy-butt?", Kendra said in a mocking tone.
You wish you were strong enough to teach them a lesson for once. All you could do is sit there and cry, hoping they left soon. All of a sudden, you heard Hunter whisper something. "Kinda don't blame him for staying home. His mom's pretty hot." That did it. Picking on you was one thing, but you hated when anyone talked about your mother like that.

"That's it! I'm sick of you jerks!" You then jump up and punch Hunter as hard as you can in the gut... Too bad you have the strength of a jelly mold. Upon striking the bully in his stomach, your hand deforms, squishing into itself. You whimper as you look up at the boy, an evil grin forming on his face.
"Big mistake, squirt", Hunter chuckles as he grabs your face. You start to panic as he squishes you into the concrete, pressing his weight on you until you're completely flattened. He then picks you up and starts to roll you up until you're a tiny, marble sized ball. Both bullies giggle as Hunter rolls you between his fingers. "Man, I really missed playing with you, ya know? I think we ought to do some catching up, don't you, Kendra?"
"Yeah! But what do you think we should do with the little slimeball?"
You start mentally panicking, struggling in a vain attempt to get out of Hunter's grip, but to no avail. You can't imagine what these two bullies plan on doing to you.
153331.title: Return of the bullies.

15333121.title: End of the Line

15333122.content:
"Hmm. I can't really think of anything to do with gummy boy. How bout you, Kendra?", Hunter said, tossing your tiny, balled up form into the chubby girl's bag of candy.
"Eww, gross! Get that thing out of my..." she then looked over at the horse and chuckled, having figured out what to do with you. "You know what, I think we're being a little bit mean."
"Huh? What're you talkin' about? You're not actually wanting to be nice to the gooey wimp are you?"
You couldn't believe what you were hearing. Kendra bullied you even more than Hunter during your short time in school. Could she actually be having a change of heart?

"Not to putty boy, you donkus!", she yelled to her cousin as she walked over to Charlie. If you weren't a squishy little ball right now, you'd probably be crying from your only hope being dashed to pieces. "This poor horsey had to carry this gooey little weirdo on it's back." She then looked down at you and twisted her face into an evil grin. "I think he deserves a snack."
This couldn't be happening! Surely life wasn't this cruel to you.
"Haha, yeah. Why don't you give him some strawberry bubblegum?"
No! You had to get out of here! If only you had stayed with your mother, none of this would be happening. You tremble in fear as Kendra picks your tiny form out of the bag, rolling you between her fingers. "Well, it's been fun catching up, slimeball, but you've got a horse to feed, so I'll let you get to it." With that, she takes brings you up to the Charlie's face. "Here you go, horsey, a nice little gummy boy for you."

It doesn't take long for the horse to decide you're a tasty treat and licks you up. You're forced to endure the smell of Charlie's mouth as he chews you up, mashing you with his flat teeth as the bullies' laughter can be heard outside. Laughter which catches the attention of the policewoman, who just finished her trip to the bathroom. If only she had finished a minute sooner!
"Hey, what's going on here?", she asks the two kids.

"Oh, uh, I was just giving your horsey a little bit of my candy", Kendra says, shaking what little remained of her candy in her bag. "That's alright isn't it?"
As the horse continues to chew you up, you can hear the officer chuckle. "Sure. It's okay if Charlie here has a little treat every now and then, but don't give him to much. It tends to get... backed up."
"Eeeeewww!", the kids say in unison before giggling a bit, knowing that you would soon join the horse's waste.
The woman looks around and notices you are missing. "Say, you two haven't seen a little boy around here, have you? He was lost and I told him I'd take him to his mom."
The Kendra and Hunter look at each other for a moment, trying hard not to giggle. "Nope. Maybe he found his mom and went with her on his own."

"Hmm. Maybe. Still, though. I think I'd better keep an eye out for him." As soon as she finishes her sentence, the horse swallows you, squeezing you down it's throat and sending you to the stomach with the rest of it's food. The officer mounts her horse and waves to the two bullies as she leaves, unaware of what they had done to you.

====================================

After a couple of minutes, you start to regain your shape. It was cramped in the horse's gut and it smelled. You immediately start to struggle and cry out, hoping that the policewoman could hear you. "Let me out! Please help me!" Your struggles made the horse's belly bulge out and shake a bit, but was the officer able to hear you?
15333122.title: In the belly of the horse.

choices: You started to become pancake batter
1542.content:
Soon you and your mother went to IJump for breakfast. As you and your mother pulled in to parking lot you started to think of all the breakfast food you would like to eat, you started to think of eating eggs or waffles, or Pancakes. Soon you and your mother were placed in a booth away from the kitchen.

"Hi, welcome to IJump may I take your order?" asked a young waitress

"I will take the scrabbled eggs, a blueberry muffin, and a stack of pancakes" said your mother

"And you little guy?" asked the waitress

"I like pancakes please" you said

Soon the waitress left, you looked around the places and see it was packed with a ton of people, soon the waiting game started. you soon see a old claw game in a hallway near the kitchen, you asked your mother for some coins and she gives you a handful of quarters. As you walked down the hallway you smelled the sweet smell of pancakes and waffles, you looked around to see if anyone was watching and you sneaked into the kitchen to see all the breakfast food being made. But then you hear someone coming and you franticly looked around to find a place to hide, you noticed a small container near the back and you ran to it and jumped into it, but you noticed that it was full of pancake batter, you tried to get out but the foot steps were getting closer and you hid in the unblended pancake batter.

You waited, hoping they wont find you, But then you felt something big and metal lays on top of your back, and noticed it was a large mixing Wisk. And then...
1542.title: IJump ((A breakfast focused restaurant))

15421.content:
the whisk came down and whatever cook was using it turned it on. you had no chance to cry out to reveal yourself before the whisk was spinning you around messing up your gummy body like soft clay as you began to mix with the pancake batter, milk and cinnemon were added into the mix with you as you were blended into a fine smooth batter.you felt the whisk being pulled out and tried to move as it dripped a few dollops of the mix back into the large container but you were too well mixed in with the batter and practically a liquid right now.

your world shifted as the container was tipped up, pouring a portion of you out into a sizzling pan. over and over you were poured out into pancake pans feeling the heat under you making you bubble slightly, thickening as the batter began to cook. you saw the cook above you as you were flipped and went face down on the pan, clearly you looked no different to normal pancakes because the cook didn't bat an eye. it was an odd sensation to feel each part of your pancake body being flipped and moved in the pans before finally you were ready. you felt yourself being stacked before the one with your face in was flipped onto the top of the pile.

you stared up as the cook drizzled syrup onto your pancake stack body and sprinkled some blueberries and strawberries ontop of you before placing the plate on the collection tray and dinging the bell to alert the waitress the order was ready to be collected. you can't tell if you are the only thing on the plate or not as your staring blurrily through syrup up at the ceiling but you see the waitress from before collect your plate and carry you over to your mothers table. this was not good, you really didn't want to be your mothers pancakes, but then what if you were your order of pancakes instead, you would sit on the plate getting cold while your mother wondered where you were. would she find out you were the pancakes or would you end up being scraped off into the bin...
15421.title: You started to become pancake batter

choices: She isn't able to find you anywhere, so she gives up.
She slowly begins to put two and two together.
154211.content:
The waitress set you down on the table in front of your mom, confirming your fear that you were indeed the food that your mom had ordered. Your mom smiled down at you, a brief ravenous look crossing her face. She glanced around the restaurant, and then back down at you. She shrugged her shoulders, and then picked up a fork and a knife.

“Oh well. I guess I don’t have to wait for Jack.” She decided, and stabbed her fork down into you.

You let out a mental scream of pain as the sharp metal prongs sunk into your pancake body, puncturing all layers of you.

Your mom then slid her knife down through your body, cutting off several chunks of you. By this point, you were crying and screaming in pain and suffering, but you weren’t making any audible noises of course.

Your mom continued to saw your body into pieces, humming a little tune to herself while she did so. By the time she had finished, you had been chopped up into about twenty different pieces of pancake, and you were hurt and afraid. You looked up at your mom in despair, and she merely grinned down at you and licked her lips. She punctured one of your pieces with her fork, and then raised the piece to her mouth.

She dropped the chunk of pancake into her mouth, and chewed it up with a look of satisfaction on her face. She swallowed, and you saw the lump in her throat go down. You knew that she had just consumed one of your limbs, and the rest of you would quickly follow.

Your mom poured a little more syrup over your body, and then continued to devour her meal. She ate piece after piece of you, slowly but surely consuming your entire self. Finally, only the piece containing your face was left, and you stared up at the monster that was your mom in horror. She pierced your face with her fork, and lifted you to her mouth.

She threw you in to her mouth, and your vision was filled with darkness. The heat and moisture in her mouth overwhelmed you. Your pancake body was covered with saliva and pieces of chewed up food.

Without hesitation, your mom chewed you up, her mashing teeth crushing your poor body. You were grinded up within seconds, leaving you as nothing but pieces of food. Your mom’s tongue lifted up, and you rolled back towards her throat. A large wave of apple juice washed up behind you, carrying you straight down your mother’s esophagus. You landed with a splash in her stomach soon after.

Your mom leaned back in her seat, and patted her stomach appreciatively. Just then, she sat up abruptly in her chair. She realized that you hadn’t shown up yet, and it had been over fifteen minutes. She looked around the restaurant again, and didn’t see you anywhere. She stood up from her chair, and began to search the restaurant for you.
154211.title: Some Delicious Pancakes

1542112.content:
Your mother picked out little bits of you that were still stuck between her teeth as she searched the restaurant for you, unaware that her son was gurgling away in her tummy. You couldn't believe the situation that you were in. You attempted to call out to her in your fleshy prison, but all you managed was a series of bubble.

"*Urp!* Excuse me", Trish said aloud as she began to sneak a few bites of the pancakes that were meant for you, figuring you wouldn't finish them anyway. "Hmm... these taste a little different than mine", she said as she chewed the pancakes up. You briefly felt a little bit of chewed up pancakes splash into your melted form before you began to drain into your mom's intestines. It seemed that you were going to take a trip through your mother's digestive system. What fun. "The other ones had a little hint of strawberry in them. Maybe I should've shared some of them with... wait, strawberry?!" Trish quickly figured out what had happened and why you were taking so long. She had eaten her son. Not wanting to cause a scene, your mom paid for both of your meals and got back into her car and drove home, occasionally looking down at her belly. "Jackie, if you can hear me, mommy is so sorry, sweetie", she said as she rubbed her belly.

Of course, you had moved on from her stomach. By now, you were deep in Trish's intestines. You could barely make out what your mom was saying, the sounds of her body drowning out her voice. Having been mixed in with the pancake batter, your mother's body drained you of what little nutrients that you gained from your shared breakfast, as well as all of the sugar (which would be absorbed into her as a bit of pudge). By the time she arrived home, you had been compacted into a discolored gooey mass and came to a rest in her colon. Your mother's insides stunk horribly, and you would have cried from humiliation if you weren't so focused on being grossed out. Your mom ran into the bathroom and sat her thick booty on the toilet before releasing an embarrassingly loud fart. "Sorry, sweetie!", she called down to you, hearing your muffled whimpers as she had begun pushing you out. "*sigh* How does Jack get himself into these messes?", Trish thought, releasing yet another smelly fart. "He was rather delicious, though", she thought to herself. "Probably the best breakfast I've ever eaten. Wait, what am I thinking?!"

You squirmed your battered form toward your mother's asshole, eager to exit her body as soon as you could. As your struggled continued, you felt your mom's intestines compress you tightly, a soft moaning being heard throughout her body. "Oh fuck that feels so good", your mom moaned to herself. You were completely unaware that your attempts to squeeze out of your mom's ass were causing her pleasure. "God, if I ate him again, I'd get to... dammit Trish, snap out of it!", your mom audibly yelled to herself. Luckily for you, her thick cheeks muffled most of her noises. Your mom had focused all of her attention on you for such a long time, that she had begun to have certain... urges. It wasn't uncommon for you to wake up pressed between her thighs or compressed inside of her mouth. You had never actually met your father, only very rarely hearing about him from your mom or Barbara, and from what they said, he had it even worse than you did.

"That's your son in there, not a toy", she said to herself, seemingly battling back a part of her that she had hidden long ago. "Then again, he is a tasty little thing. Another snack won't hurt..." Trish hit her head in frustration as she thought of what to do...
1542112.title: Safe trip through mommy.

155.content: You were starting to get impatient. She was really dragging this on.
155.title: Somewhere else

1551.content:
You jump up in excitement. You love going to the circus. You can't recall a time when you went and ever having anything but good memories coming back. Granted, your mother wouldn't let you out of her sight, but it was still very fun for you. You quickly get dressed into a pair of blue pants and your favorite blue dragon scale-patterned shirt and wait for your mother, scarfing down a cup of yogurt and leaving out a breakfast bar for your mother before leaving. You knew that it was always packed, and Trish usually did these things last-minute, so you got pretty bad seats, so the faster you got ready, the faster you were able to leave. You only hoped that your mom didn't take forever like it usually did. This time, it didn't.

As she rushed out, still brushing her hair and the breakfast bar halfway in her mouth and attempting to keep her coffee from spilling, you opened the door for her and quickly moved out of the way as she sat down and buckle up, too anxious to sit still. Your mom chuckled. "Well, someone's excited."
"We haven't been to the circus in like forever! I heard this year's going to be super-awesome!" Your mom tousled your hair before backing up.

====================================================================

Upon entering the tent, you were immediately amazed by how crowded it was. Most often, you would get there late enough where only a few people wouldn't have been seated. Your mom picked you up and carried you on her shoulders, not wanting to risk you getting stepped on. You were light enough that you didn't put much of a strain on her neck and back. "Ooh! Mom, can we get some cotton candy!", you excitedly cry.
"Not now, son. We have to find our seats first."
"Can I get a t-shirt?"
"Jack, what did I say?"
"Oh! Oh! They have those light-up spiny-things! Can...?"
"Jack!", you were testing your mother's patience.
"Oh... um, sorry mom."

"*sigh* I know, you're just excited. As soon as we find our seats, we can think about getting souvenirs after the show."
"Okay..."

Picking you up off of her shoulders, she sat you in a seat that was actually fairly close to the center. There were a few people on each side of you, other kids also accompanied by their parents. As your mother went to take the seat right next to you, you heard a gurgling noise coming from her stomach. "Shit! Jack, stay here, mommy needs to use the restroom."
As Trish ran out to the lavatory, you were a bit worried. Any time you were left on your own never ended well. But... with her gone, now would be your chance to get a closer look at the performers. You always dreamed of joining the circus when you grew up, and what better way to learn that to observe the performers up close?

What are you going to do?
1551.title: The circus

choices: Andrew. He wants you to meet his friends.
his little brother, wanting to play with you.
1552.content:
You were a little disappointed, but he was your best friend. "Is the party going to be at his house?", you asked.
"Of course, sweetie."
You started having flashbacks of your various experiences over there. The first time you met Andrew was when you were much younger and you and your mother first moved in. Their family invited you and your mother over to a pool party with their friends. You kind of kept to yourself and avoided Andrew (still getting over your experiences in public school). Both of your parents had a little bit too much to drink and Andrew's mother accidentally sat on you. She inadvertently brought you inside and passed out on the couch, after about an hour of drinking. Andy noticed you struggling and peeled you off of his mom's behind. You had been best friends ever since. It was also this time that your mother realized that she needed to be more protective of you.
Another time, you came over for his little brother's birthday and you caught one of his friends nibbling on your fingers. You managed to get away from the girl, but you spent the entire time avoiding her before Andrew scared her away.

Despite your reservations, going to his birthday party was the least you could do for him after all the times he saved you. You ran into your room and searched for a gift for Andrew. Your mother told you that she already got him a gift card, but you felt like you needed to give him a gift yourself. You picked it out last week: an impossible to find Pikachu 3DS. Andrew's mother didn't really pay much attention to him, so he didn't have very many video games aside from the ones your mom got him for doing a few chores around the house.

You suddenly realized something. Some of Andrew's friends from school were also going to be there. You usually avoided them and didn't show up until the party was practically over. Andrew understood why you were so afraid, but you couldn't hide forever.
"Hey, mom, I'm gonna go over next door and give Andrew my gift."
"You had better be careful, son."
"Don't worry!"

You quickly ran to Andrew's house and knocked on the door. After a rather annoying encounter with Barbara, his mother, you walked inside. For reasons you've never been able to understand, she always seemed like she's had it out for you. Sometimes she convinced your mom to have you watch Stevie (which rarely turned out well), and convinced her that your incidents with him were because of your carelessness. Several other times, when both of your families went out for activities, you had often found yourself getting sat on by her or your mom, conveniently any time they were wearing skirts or an outfit similar to yours, with you spending the rest of the day stuck to their butts. Your mom had convinced you that it was just an accident, but accidents don't happen that often...

You entered the house feeling a little sorry for Andrew. His mother was the most unpleasant person you had ever met. You could see why Andrew liked to spend the night so much. You quickly left her and searched for Andrew. You wanted to give him your gift in person.
You looked for a few minutes before you were approached by...
1552.title: Andrew's birthday party

15521.content:
"Hey Jack over here!"You hear Andrew yell as you see him toward the back with a bunch of other boys. "Hey Andrew, happy birthday dude."You say as you approach him. "Thanks man, let me introduce you to my other friends." He puts his hand on your shoulder and walks you toward to boys, "Jack this is Quinton and the one with the glasses is Geoffrey, guys this is Jack." You smile and wave at them, you were always a little shy around new people. "So your the squishy kid."Quinton says as he begins to look you over.

"Yeah......but how did you know that?" As far as you knew no one but your family and Andrew's family knew about your condition well besides a couple people who found out by accident but you were sure he wasn't one of them. "I sort of told them the first day I met you,"Andrew admits, "I thought it was so cool that you could do stuff like that, I had to tell my friends." You were a little ticked but also strangely flattered. Sure your best friend had told people about your condition without asking you but it was because he thought it was cool. "So can you really get squished, rolled into a ball, and stuff like that?"Geoffrey asks really excited.

"Uh......yeah I can, I'm basically a human version of gum." It wasn't the best way to explain your body but it was the only way you knew how, your mom had always used that to explain you to your relatives and to Andrew's family. "Cool!"Both boys scream out in excitement. "It's nothing special really, "You blush, "I've actually was swallowed by a raccoon once cause of it. I couldn't even wear diapers as a baby cause they would absorb me."The two boys didn't care, they still thought you were cool.

"Yeah, I've had to roll him into a ball and stick him in my pocket a couple times to sneak him pass my brother."Andrew laughs slapping you on the back causing your torso to deform a bit showing a clear hand type bulge. "Awesome!!!"The two other boys scream as your body reforms back to normal. You were hitting it off great with Quinton and Geoffrey, or at least that's what it seemed like. "Andrew honey come over here and say hi to your cousins!"You hear a voice yell. "Sorry guys I'll be right back."Andrew says as he walks toward the voice leaving you with Quinton and Geoffrey.
15521.title: Andrew. He wants you to meet his friends.

choices: Your left alone with Quinn and Geoffrey for a bit longer
155211.content:
"So you guys go to school with Andrew?"You ask thinking that you guys were getting along. "Yeah but we don't have a squishy peasant there or any peasants for that matter."Quinn says a bit snarky. "Yeah I don't think there are,"You start to say before it hits you, "did you call me a peasant?" This was very confusing to you, you guys seemed like you were getting along just a minute ago. What could have happened to make that change so quickly? Were they just pretending in front of Andrew?

"I don't know why Andrew would be friends with a peasant like you."Geoffrey remarks laughing. "Now Geoffrey,"Quinn buts in, "you know Andrew has always had a soft side for the poor." This was getting more and more confusing by the second, what did they mean by the poor? Andrew's house was pretty much just like yours, sure it was a bit bigger but otherwise the same. He did chores around your house for video games for crying out loud. Could he be better off then you thought?

"What school do you guys go to anyway?"You had to ask, you had to know if Andrew bad been hiding that he was rich from you. "Barrington Academy, were no peasants are allowed..........well except for that one but that was a few years ago."Quinn laughs. Barrington Academy! That place was for the super rich, how the heck could Andrew afford to go there? Was his family really billionaires or something? "But that place is kids from super rich families, does this look like a house that billionaires would live in?" Quinn and Geoffrey bust out laughing. "The peasant seriously doesn't know, that's classic!" You were getting pretty ticked at this. "Tell me how Andrew can afford to go there!"You need to know.

"Because his uncle is Todd Barrington,"Quinn laughs, "Owner and founder of Barrington Academy." You couldn't believe it. "His mom's sister is married to Todd. They don't have kids so they treat Andrew and his brother like they were their kids."Geoffrey laughs, "They even have trust funds, half of which could easily buy your house 20 times over." You were shocked, how could Andrew have not told you this? Was he embarrassed to have a friend who was middle class? No it couldn't be that, you were sure he had a good reason.
155211.title: They were secretly bullies. (Uh oh)

1552111.title: End of the Line

choices: They grab you and drag you to another room (Uh oh)
1552112.content:
You continued to wonder, was Andrew embarrassed by you? Could your friend really be so shallow? Quinn and Geoffrey were having a field day while you pondered this, "The little peasant can't take that Andrew is embarrassed to be friends with someone so poor." Geoffrey laughs. Why the heck would Andrew hang around such jerks? That's when it hit you.

"Did it ever occur to you guys that he isn't embarrassed about being friends with me but about being friends with you?" You ask with a big smile. They instantly stop laughing, "What's that suppose to mean?!"They ask in unison. "Just think about it." You laugh, "He's told you about me right but I have never heard a single thing about you two. Sounds to me that you two jerks are the ones he is embarrassed to be friends with." That remark got them visibly mad.

"Its you he's embarrassed to be friends with not us!"Quinn replies getting pretty mad. "He's bragged about me to you. You only do that if you think something is cool, not if you're embarrassed by it."You reply a bit snarky. This only enraged them even more.
1552112.title: Your left alone with Quinn and Geoffrey for a b...

15521121.title: End of the Line

choices: "You did say please." (stuff you in their undies)
15521122.content:
"You've asked for it peasant!"Quinn says as he grabs you, covering your mouth,and drags you out of the room. "Let me go!"You mumble through his hand. You frantically try to get someone's attention to no avail, you were on your own. "You should have just stayed quiet." Geoffrey laughs as they drag you into the computer room and lock the door. "Now what should we do to teach this little pest his place in the world."Quinn smiles.

You struggle with all you might, which wasn't really much at all, but you couldn't break free of Quinn's grip. "Well we could sit on him."Geoffrey suggests. "No that's to good for him."Quinn replies, "We could stick him in our underwear for the day." "Hey didn't Andrew say that he got swallowed by a raccoon once and survived the trip through its body? Why don't one of us eat him?" Geoffrey smiles evilly. Oh this was beyond bad. Sure you had survived going through the raccoon but no one knew why. It could have been because of your ability or because its stomach acids were weak.

Granted being stuffed into another kid's underwear wasn't pleasant either but at least you would have a 100% survival rate. "Please pick the undies please pick the undies."You mumble. "He wants us to pick stick him in our underwear."Geoffrey laughs. "Aw does the little peasant not want to see the inside of our tummies?"Quinn mocks.
15521122.title: They grab you and drag you to another room (Uh oh)

155211221.content:
"Time for lunch."Quinn laughs as he grabs your head and shoves it into his mouth. You frantically squirm trying to get your head out of his mouth. "Hey who said you get to eat him?"Geoffrey whines grabbing your legs, shoving them into his mouth. This was getting worst by the second. The two boys begin to frantically swallow, each wanting you inside their bellies instead of the others. The force of each of them threaten to tear your body in half. Now you could survive quite a lot but you had never been torn in half.

Your head enters Quinn's throat, at this point you were only hoping that you were not torn apart. Sure there was a chance that you wouldn't survive inside a human stomach but there was less of a chance if you were torn apart. You dig your arms in and start to pull yourself forward hoping to pull your lower half out of Geoffrey's mouth.
155211221.title: "To bad." (Eat you)

155211222.content:
You could hear both of their bellies growl, but they had something else better planned. They may eventually eat you, but they wanted to have some fun with you before that. "You know, Geoffrey..." Quinn started, "I think maybe we should give the tiny boy what he wants. After all, wouldn't that seem like a good idea to you?" Quinn stated with a raise of an eyebrow.

"You know, I actually DO like the sound of that. The little boy should be taught a lesson that larger people rule this world!" Geoffery said, licking his lips. "But I do like the sound of eating him too. He can't die, remember?" Geoffrey finished, glancing down at you. Quinn grinned, licking his own lips in return. "Yes, I do remember, but if we take him home tonight, we could take turns eating him. I eat him tonight, then you eat him tomorrow."

Geoffery and Quinn both could see the fear in your eyes. "I suppose your right, Quinn. I like that idea!" Geoffery smirked.

"The best question is, Geoffrey, who gets to stuff him into their underwear for the trip home? You or me?" Quinn questioned, crossing his arms over his chest. "Since I saw him first, I guess I should." Geoffrey smiled at Quinn. "But it was MY idea!" Quinn replied with a bit of anger.

"Why don't we do rock papers sizors?" Geoffrey suggested. "Okay, you're on, Geoffrey!"

Geoffrey and Quinn both smirked, gazing down at you as they played rock, papers, sizors.

The question is, who won?
155211222.title: Into someplace...dark....

choices: They managed to get away! (You're doomed)
1552112221.content:
"Rock, paper, scissors!" Geoffery and Quin shouted, throwing out their trump card; Geoffery threw rock, Quin threw scissors.

"Rock beats scissors!" Geoffery laughed in triumph. Geoffery then picked you up and held you up to his face. "Well, Gummy Boy, looks like you belong to me now."

Your eyes widened in shock and fear. Sure, you've lost count of the number of times you've been kidnapped in your nine-year short life, but you were always returned to your family in some way in the end. But they way Geoffery spoke, you could tell that Geoffery had every intention of keeping you forever.

"Hey," Quin said as Geoffery's hand started to move you towards his pants. "Before you stuff him in your underwear, I'm curious of how he looks under his clothes. Like, does Gummy Boy look like us under there. OR..." he said, pausing for dramatic effect with his index finger sticking up. "Is he really a boy?"

You didn't like where this was going. "I'm a boy! I'm a boy, I swear!" you squeaked in panic.

"I dunno...." Geoffery said, smirking. "One way to find out though."

"NO!" you squealed as Geoffery grabbed the bottom of your shirt and yanked it up and off. This all happened so suddenly that you could not recover in time to stop Geoffery yanking down your pants and underwear and plucking them off your ankles.

You stood there naked as Geoffery and Quin looked over you. They saw your genitals before you brought your knees up and curled into a ball in an effort to hide your privates.

"Welp, he's a boy alright," Geoffery said. "Now let's get outta here before Andrew comes back!"

Geoffery started squishing you into a little ball before he stretched out the front of his pants and dropped you into the front of his underwear. You landed on soft briefs cotton before your plunged into darkness as Geoffery let the waistband of his pants go, causing it to snap close against his belly.
1552112221.title: Geoffrey Won!

choices: Geoffery wants a turn with the human yo-yo.
They decided to do something else with you.
15521122211.content:
Thump, thump, thump..... was all you could hear as you bounced up and down within your underwear prison with each step Geoffery took.The sounds from Andrew's party grew fainter and fainter as Geoffery walked further and further away from it, until you could no longer hear anything but the sound of Geoffery's footsteps.

At long last, Geoffery stopped walking and you were suddenly bathed in sunlight as he opened his pants. You looked up, blinded by the light and felt a hand closing around your body. When your blindness faded away, you saw that you were in a different backyard now with Geoffery and Quin looking at you eagerly.

"Now, I'm going to turn you into our ball!" Geoffery said, grinning wickedly.

"Wait, I have an idea!" Quin said with an even more sinister look on his face. He held out his hand. "Lemme see him!"

Geoffery shrugged and dropped you into Quin's waiting palm.

"Now, you're going to be our gum boy yo-yo!" Quin announced, which caused Geoffery to roar with laughter.

"Dude! That's hilarious! Do it!" Geoffery said, still laughing.

Your eyes widened in fear. "No! No, don't!" you cried as Quin reached to you with the other hand. You yelped in shock and indignation when Quin pinched a bit of your body between his finger and thumb and pull it out, stretching it into a long string, still attached to your body.

When Quin decided that the bit of you was long enough, he wrapped it around your upper body.

"Okay, now watch this," Quin said to Geoffery, wrapping the string of your mass around his finger before dropping you.

He let go of your body and you fell, rolling over and over as you went down and then you felt a painful jerk in your body as you became completely unwrapped and then you shot back up, your body re-wrapping itself in your "string"!
When you reach Quin's hand, he closed it around your body.

"What do you think? I call this the Human Yo-Yo!" Quin said, to guffaw from Geoffery.

"Oh man! That's hilarious!" Geoffery gasped, holding his ribs.

You would have been angry at this treatment of your body, but at the moment, you were too dizzy from spinning down and back up again to feel any such emotion.

Quin dropped your body again, and again, you spun around and around as you went down and then with a jerk, your body sprung back up again, re-wrapping your body in your long gummy string as you went.
15521122211.title: They managed to get away! (You're doomed)

155211222111.title: End of the Line

155211222112.content:
Geoffery continues to laugh as Quin played with your yo-yo body. He did all kinds of tricks with you, all of which made you feel dizzy.

"Okay, let's play basketball now." Geoffery said.

You mentally sighed with relief until Geoffery took your yo-yo body from Quin and begin to mold you into a bigger ball -- a basketball!

"Gummy boy can be our basketball!" Geoffery said, spinning you around atop the tip of his finger.

Quin, however, looked thoughtful. "I dunno.... d'you think his body is firm enough to withstand being bounced on the ground? If not, we'll have to find something else to do with him."

"Only one way to find out..." Geoffery said and he dropped you.
155211222112.title: They decided to do something else with you.

choices: Good. He thinks of you as a friend.
Bad. He bullies you and sees you as a toy and snack.
15522.content:
"Ack!", you heard a familiar little voice cry out. It was Stevie, Andrew's four year-old brother (he had trouble making the "J" sound). Whenever Andrew came over, he usually took his little brother with him. Even though your mother thought he was adorable, you were a little scared of him, having been eaten by him when he was a baby. You were fortunate enough that Andrew played rough with him and he was able to spit you up. It didn't help your fear that he was almost the same size a you were now. He always tried to wrestle with you, but his big brother always stopped him.

You mentally panicked as he happily ran toward you.

What kind of relationship does he have with you?

155221.title: End of the Line

155222.content:
Being only four years old Stevie didn't get that you being basically living silly putty was because of a medical condition. To him you were just a toy that could move and talk. But that was nothing compared to what would happen if he ever got a hold of you if he was hungry. This was definitely a bad situation.

"Ack Ack!!" Stevie yells smiling. He was pretty smart for a toddler, he knew that if he treated you like a toy in front of his mother or brother he would get in trouble. Although he could be very stubborn when he wanted to. Heck he still wore diapers just because he flat out refused to use the toilet, or as he called it the "towet". That complicated things even more.

"H-h-hi S-S-Stevie."You reply nervously forcing a smile as he runs up and hugs you. "Will you play with me?"He asks looking up at you with a cutesy smile, you weren't fooled by that for once second. "Not r-r-right now Stevie."You just hoped that Andrew would see you soon and save you from his little brother. "Play with me."Stevie replies tighting his hug. If your bones could break you were certain that his hug would come pretty close to doing it.

"Sorry Stevie but I gotta find Andrew."You wheeze trying to catch your breath. "Play!"Stevie whines tighting his grip even more. Even though you were practically immortal you still needed to breathe, even if it was half as much as a normal human, and you could definitely feel pain. "Stevie.....let.....go."You wheeze, your vision was starting to fade. It wouldn't be long till you passed out from lack of oxygen. "Play play play!"Stevie whines tighting his grip again.
155222.title: Bad. He bullies you and sees you as a toy and s...

choices: Trent comes over and scares Stevie.
He lets you get eaten. He can't do anything without getting in trouble.
1552221.content:
"Stevie, you brat, let Jack go now!" From hearing that voice you could tell you were saved. Turning your head around, you could tell it was Andrew.

Stevie whined, tightening his grip. "No, bubba! I found 'im first, so Ack mine!" After sticking his tongue out at him, he started munching on your head, trying to eat you to keep Andrew from taking you away. You kicked and begged for help as he chewed on your forehead. Andrew wanted to hit him, but he knew that Stevie would tell on him and get him in trouble.

Andrew tried to grab you from him, but Stevie just whined and held you tighter. He spit out your head and backed up from his big brother. "Mine! If you take 'im, I tell mommy you hit me!" With that, he went back to chewing on you. As your face was being covered in his saliva, Andrew wasn't sure what to do. He wanted to free you from his Stevie, but he didn't want you to spend the party inside of his little brother's belly.
1552221.title: Saved by the birthday boy?

choices: "...sneak one of my presents to my room."
15522211.content:
Just as you thought you were doomed...

"URHGAAUGH!!!" Even you screamed as you saw what you perceived to be a clown-like devil come up behind Stevie. As soon as the younger boy saw it, he shrieked and let go of you, where you were immediately grabbed by Andrew, your head covered in the four year-old's saliva. Stevie noticed this and immediately started throwing a fit.
"Mine! Ack mine! I'm telling mommy!" Stevie yelled before running off.

"Jeez, Andrew, your brother's a real brat", the kid in the demon mask said, before removing the mask. It took you a while to recognize him, as he wasn't wearing blue face paint or a fake beard. It was Trent, a boy who went trick or treating with you, a girl named Gina, and Andrew and his brother and cousin, Ash. He was a tough eight year-old kid with semi-long reddish-brown hair, who liked sports, breaking things, and was almost always covered in dirt. He had somehow found a way to get dirty at Andrew's birthday party.


"Th-thanks for that", you said to the boy as you wiped the saliva out of your face.

"No problem", Trent said as he stuffed the mask into his back pack.

"We should probably play the game in my room if we don't want him butting it."

"Huh, what game?", you ask.

"Me and a bunch of my other friends are gonna go play truth or dare. You wanna come? It'll be fun."

Andrew grabs you and asks if he can bury you in the sand.
15532.content:
"I think we ought to go to the beach before it gets too crowded. The earlier we leave, the better." You squealed in excitement. "Go change into your swim trunks and see if the Morrisons want to come."
"*sigh* Okay..." You weren't terribly enthusiastic about going with the Morrisons. Sure, Andrew was your best friend, but his family was pretty unbearable. His four year-old brother, Stevie, often took advantage of your condition and sometimes used you like a toy. His mother wasn't much better. She doesn't pay much attention to Andrew and she mocks you if she finds you squished somewhere. But she was an old friend of your mother's from high school, so you had to be nice.

==================================

After changing into your swim trunks, you gathered up some towels and sat in the front seat. You were excited to go to the beach today, since your mom was starting to trust you more on your own. You set the beach bag on the floor. You got your DS out to play it, but you stopped after hearing the car door open. You looked up to see that Ms. Morrison was about to sit on you! You whimpered before being jerked away by Andrew.
"Mom! You almost sat on Jack!", Andrew yelled. "You need to be more careful."
"Well, maybe he ought to pay attention and not sit in other people's seats", Ms. Morrison snapped back. "If you ask me, it looks like he wants to get smashed."
You and Andrew sat in the back and buckled up. "Don't listen to her, Jack."
You pulled your DS out and started playing. "Hey, where's Stevie?"
"Oh, he's afraid of seagulls, so he's staying with my cousin", Andrew replied.
"But... they're dumb birds. Why would he be scared of them?"
Andrew shrugged his shoulders. "Dunno. You used to be scared of me, remember?"
"That's... that's different, though..." You were hesitant to tell him about your experiences in public school.

==================================================================

Upon arriving, you and Andrew quickly ran out into the sand. "Jack wait!", your mother calls out. "You need your sunscreen!" You groan as you head back to your mother where she spreads the thick lotion. "You don't want to melt in the sun, do you Jackie?"
"No, momma..."
She spreads the lotion all over your body including...
"M-M-MOM!", you yell, shoving your mother's hand out of your trunks.
"Jack, I need to cover all of you or it won't make a difference."
"I-I can do that part myself." You take a little glob of lotion and spread it over your groin and butt. "Okay, I'm done, can I go now?"
"You need to wait until the lotion sets in before you can go in the water. Why don't you go play in the sand or something?"
"*groan* okay..." You grab a bucket and shovel and start making a sand castle as Trish and Ms. Morrison go find a spot to sunbathe. You were pretty proud of your ability to make cool looking sand castles, so you weren't too bummed out. After about ten minutes, you had completely forgotten about the sunblock setting in, getting too into your sand castle to care. You only stopped when you noticed something on your arm.
15532.title: Car Trip to the Beach

155321.content:
You jumped as you felt the gull's feet dig into your putty-like body. Your movements seemed to startle the bird, but it jumped right back onto your arm. You giggled as it scooted up toward your head. " Heehee.You're a friendly little guy." You tried to reach out to tickle it, but it jumped off. The seagull looked at you almost cautiously. You knew that most birds were skittish and didn't normally warm up to people. You put your hand down and waited for it to come up to you. After a few minutes of going back and forth, it finally scooted itself in your hand. "See? I'm not gonna hurt y-" You stopped once you saw that the seagull started nibbling on your finger.

You quickly pulled your hand away and tried to hit the bird. "N-no, birdie! Get out of here!" The gull didn't seem too scared, as it ignored your flailing and grabbed your fingers with it's beak. The bird greedily started gulping your hand down. "Let go of me, you stupid bird! I'm not food!" You tried slapping it away with your free hand, only for the hungry seagull to snap at it and shove it in it's beak. "Oh no! Somebody help me!" You tried to pull your arms out, but you appeared to be too weak. "No! Why do I have to be so wimpy..." By now, the bird had gulped you down to your shoulders. "Will somebody please help me?! Ple-mmphhhffff!!!" The gull had now started chomping down on your face. You tried to use your feet to pull you out, but soon the seagull had them in it's throat. After a few minutes, the hungry bird had you completely in it's stomach.

"Stupid bird! Why does this keep happening to me?!", you whined. This was humiliating. You managed to get yourself eaten by a seagull, a dumb bird that fed on trash and fish. At least the raccoon you were eaten by was a predator. There was at least some dignity in that. The bird that ate you had become so stuffed, that it could barely fly. It managed to fly on top of truck where it sat to rest as it digested you.

Meanwhile, you continued to struggle in it's belly. Since the stomach was so small, you were squished and conformed to the shape of it's stomach. You tried wiggling your body, but you were so compressed that you couldn't do anything but cry. It smelled terrible, like garbage and rotten fish. You hoped that you were able to escape soon.

=======================================================

After about an hour, you were in the bird's large intestine and it was light enough to fly again. This was hell. And you thought the stomach smelled bad. As it flew, you felt yourself rock and move with the gull. If your body wasn't practically liquid right now, you'd throw up. "I hate the beach!", you mentally screamed. "And I hate birds!" You suddenly felt the intestines move you toward the bird's anus, pushing you along with a small fart. The now-satisfied seagull flew closer to the ground and pooped you out, completing your tour of it's body. You didn't have any time to react as you plummeted toward...
155321.title: Bird Food

1553211.content:
You mentally screamed as you plummet toward the unforgiving ground below. You just hoped that you landed somewhere safe, and far away from any hungry birds. Rather than crashing into the sand, you were surprised to feel a cold, almost liquid substance cushion your fall. Looking up, you saw Ms. Morrison's beach umbrella. The seagull must not have gone very far after eating you. Your body had been so abused by the gull's body, it was going to take a long time for your body to reform. "I hope someone notices me", you thought.
"Hey, Barbara, have you seen Jack? I could have sworn he was playing in the sand, but I don't see him anywhere", your mom inquired. You suddenly saw a hand squish your body into a smooth, warm surface. You realized what the cold gel you landed in was. Sunscreen! You were being rubbed into someone's skin and used as sunscreen!
"I'm sure he's fine, Trish. He's probably swimming." You felt two hands rub you harder into the skin, spreading you thinner across the surface. You noticed that whatever part of the body you were on, it felt sort of soft, but with some obvious muscle. The three body parts that came to mind were the stomach, back and... "Please let me be on their stomach or back...", you mentally whined, not wanting to think about the possibility of being spread on someone's butt.

"I just can't help but think that it was a mistake to leave him by himself." Your mom said. "You know he's lazy, he probably didn't put enough sunscreen on and melted. What if someone stepped on him? Or..."
"Trish, calm down. You're going to worry yourself to death. You can't baby him forever, you know. You need to let him be on his own for a little bit." You got upset at Ms. Morrison a bit. You knew how "good" of a parent she was.
"*sigh* I suppose you're right."
"Yeah, I can help watch him, too", Andrew butted in.

You couldn't stand being so close to them, but unable to alert them to your predicament. As they got finished applying the sunblock (and you) to their skin, you felt them walk off into the sun. Seeing who was still there, you could tell that you were rubbed onto...
